Adam was sitting at the back of his middle school classroom, admiring the girl of his dreams - Katie. She was an athletic champion, a teacher's pet, and a total knockout bombshell beauty. And, what was more, she was single. But she'd never be interested in an average boy with few talents like Alex, especially since she rejected every single boy on the football team who asked to date her. As the final school bell rang, Alex packed up his school bag and quietly walked out, hoping not to draw any attention from bullies.

Ben was crying in the elementary school changing rooms when the bell rang. He'd been the last pick of both sides in dodge ball due to his being extremely uncoordinated and weak. He mostly had to sit in the corner again while all his classmates had fun, which annoyed him. He wished he could be strong! But he was nothing - not good at school, or sports; condemned to mediocrity just like his brother Adam. Ben couldn't wait until he could drop out of school so he could just play video games or something - anything to escape the terrible reality he was in.

Wiping away his tears, he eventually made it out to meet his younger brother Cody, who was waiting by the gate for him.
"You had a tough day too, bro?" asked Cody, who had a huge black eye from being punched in the face during lunchtime.
"Just like everyday" replied Ben.
"Hey twerps" said Will, a classmate of Cody "Move out of the way will you, people who matter are coming through."
Ben and Cody stood aside reluctantly, but Will pushed them anyway, sending them flying into a brick wall and collapse on top of each other on the ground.
Immediately, Adam came running up. "Hey, that wasn't very nice! Don't treat my little brothers that way!" he called.
In response, Will punched him in the gut. Hard.
"I'll do whatever I want" bragged Will while Adam fell on top of his brothers.

In the distance, Adam could see Katie talking with two of her friends.
"Hey, isn't that the creepy boy who always sits in the back of your class?"
"Yeah, I heard he's always watching you like a creep"
"What a loser, he just got beat up by a nine-year-old"
"That whole family are losers, better just avoid them"
Listening to her friends' advice, Katie turned away while Adam lay there, heartbroken.

Meanwhile the father to the three boys, David, arrived in a cheap old car to pick them up.
"Come on kids, hop in!" he called. He didn't comment on how they were all battered and broken on the ground - that was how they usually were after school.
At the same time, a limousine arrived to pick up Will.
"Stupid executive vice president" murmured David "That idiot keeps making my life a living hell at work!"
Adam, dragging himself to the car, was more focused on the cute little pink import that had arrived to pick up Katie.
David pinched his oldest son until his pupils were no longer love-heart shaped. "No time for fantasizing, just get your seatbelt on! Traffic is appalling today!"

Almost an hour later, the family of four arrived at the caravan park they called home. The caravan trailer they owned had only two beds, so Ben and Cody had to share, while Adam had his own bed and David slept on the floor. David usually made enough money for food, but there wasn't much for anything else.

As they made their way inside, suddenly, an old woman came out of a nearby caravan. The caravan had just parked there but was quite large, with a gypsy-style design. On seeing Cody, the bruised little boy with a huge black eye, she suddenly recoiled in shock.
"You ... you are the chosen one" she stuttered.
"Uhm - what?" asked Cody.
David turned his little head away. "Let's just go inside, we don't want any trouble" he insisted.
The boys hurried in, while the old woman was left standing outside looking very confused.

As he came inside, David hit his head on the top of the door. Ben quickly rushed over with some bandages and began tending to his injury, while Adam helped Cody with his black eye.

"Do you think something good might ever happen in our family?" sighed Ben "Maybe we could win lotto or something."
"I can't really afford a ticket" said David "Ever since your mother died, that's when it all started."
All of the boys looked down to the far side of the caravan, where a big photograph of their mother hung.
"Cancer is brutal, of course" continued David "And you know we've never been in the same financial situation since we took on all that debt to fund her cancer treatments. But in the end, nothing helped."
Cody sighed. He wished there was something he could do, but like the rest of the family, he didn't know what.

"Welcome to our new home!" said Cody as the four appeared in the atrium of the giant property, staring at a giant sculpture and water feature worthy of the finest craftspeople.

“Come on, daddy! Let’s go inside!” Zac grins as he pulls on your arm before he quickly lets go.
You are about to walk into the ice cream store when suddenly the glass door of the store swings open on its own, like magic. “Oh man… We better hurry…. I think it’s going to rain soon…” you say to Zac as you look up at the cloudy, dark sky. “We need to get home!”

Just as you’re about to pick up the pace and walk home quickly, you find yourself standing in your living room with Zac sitting on the couch, happily licking his vanilla ice cream.
“Wait… What… How… How did we get home so fast?” you stutter as you realize that Zac had done it again! In a split-second, Zac had teleported you and him back to the apartment!
“I made us come back home before the rain, daddy! That’s all!” Zac grinned like it was completely normal for young boys to teleport everywhere. “I can send you places, daddy! It’s easy!”
“You… You can s-s-send me places?” you stammer, not knowing what this kid means by that.
“Oh yeah! Like, I can put you in the kitchen….” Zac stated out loud.
Suddenly, in a flash, you’re standing in the kitchen, next to the fridge, with your ice cream cone in your hand. You still hear Zac taking from the living room.

123.content:
'The Retreat' was aptly named. A retreat from civilization. A retreat from his 'friends'. A retreat from his fans. Oh, and from the ground as well.

Herbert looked out of his window as he rested his elbow on his writing desk and gazed down into the gorge. The view from up here was truly breath-taking, but he'd lived here for almost seven years now, ever since his 'big break' happened and he ran screaming from Fame. Now, with this little 'shack' (OK, mini mansion was closer. Very expensive and well fitted, just small), a good satellite internet connection and a computer he could send his novels to his agent remotely and not need to see anyone. Ever.

The first wake up call after he'd got his 'big break' had been his brother.

"Just a few grand... you can spare it."

Things had gone down hill from there. His family relations hit rock bottom on pretty much the third day after the first royalty check arrived, and his attempts to meet people to talk to outside his family got even nastier. His books since then had taken a slightly darker tone, definite works on the nature of the human condition... ie selfish and greedy. He had made a conscious effort to lift the tone in his works as even he had thought 'Darkness Conquers' had been over the top, but in the six years since then his works had gone from strength to strength. He very occasionally agreed to a web conference call, and once an online connection to a TV chat show. Other than that he was here, with the mountain, trees and his shack, and that was enough.

Leaning back he looked across the garden, the thin stretch of green along the cliff edge, and smiled. He'd known nothing of gardening when he'd set this place up and had to rely on airlifts or donkey trains to bring in supplies. It had taken quite a while to get good at it, but the soil here was very rich. Now he barely needed anything. He even had a little workshop to fix mechanical things (as much as his limited technical experience could deal with) and also had about five backups of anything he needed that he couldn't fix down in the basement... including his computers; desktops and laptops. He still occasionally got a helicopter landing supplies, but generally it was about once a year. He could just about put up with that.

*Knock knock!*

With a crunch Herbert fell over backwards in his chair, his heart beating like a drum! What the hell? The front door? Wait, he didn't have a knocker on it!

He shakily got to his feet and managed to calm down, though he was still nervous as he approached the door. Flinging it wide he found... nothing. Just his garden, the helipad and the path down the mountain.

"Hello? Are you my Father?"

Herbert jerked, glancing down and seeing a pink baby laying naked on his doorstep, no swaddling, no cradle, nothing. Just a baby! He blinked and stared at the infant for several seconds. It was obviously a girl, and clean and seemed healthy, but was unusually still and calm looking for such a young one.

"I said are you my Father?" the baby said clearly, in a rather cultured feminine tone. That sounded like an adult British woman but it was the baby, he saw her lips move.

"I... me? What?" he said articulately.

The girl frowned and crossed her tiny arms.

"Oh, did I get it wrong? I'm sorry, I thought I'd worked out English well enough." Suddenly a melodious operatic voice rang in his mind, complete with trumpets and a choir backing; "HOW IS THIS, BETTER?"

"Ack!" Herbert said, and fainted.

Yawning he sat up and pondered. Normally he wore his silk pajama bottoms in bed. Tops too if it was cold enough. Now he was naked. Why was he naked? Maybe he'd really zonked out last night. He chuckled as he remembered a dream of a little baby talking to him with a British accent.

"My, people really do need a lot of rest don't they."

Herbert froze. Yup, 'That' British accent! Slowly he turned his head to the sound of the voice and saw a naked toddler leaning up against his bedside table, maybe three years old at a guess. She turned to him and smiled. The expression looked... mature somehow, as did her posture, despite her young body.

"So, what should I do first Father... oh, wait should I use the colloquialism 'Daddy'? That seems more appropriate doesn't it. Alright. Daddy?"

Herbert blinked at the girl and stared for several seconds.

"Oh please, I checked. You CAN understand me. Can we perhaps skip the awkward bit and just get around to 'Father/Daughter'... er, things?"

"You... were a baby." he managed, feeling his head whirl.

"Mmm? Oh age. Yes terribly inconveniant, but I feel I should at least experience childhood, but the normal process is so tediously slow I sped things up a bit. Mummy was terribly surprised."

"Mummy?" Herbert said.

"Yes, I believe I went from zygote to newborn in about four hours. Oh, don't worry, I made sure it was completely painless for her. She did make a fuss when I came out though. Tisk, she really wasn't appropriate. Thus I came here. Now Daddy, what are we going to do?"

"I... " Herbert's mind spins in dozens of different directions at once, quite a few of them rather scary directions, warranting an 18 label for horrorific or gorey content. Who is this girl?

"Oh yes, my name. I did ponder just picking one at random, but it hardly seemed appropriate. Perhaps you could do the honors?"

He hadn't said that aloud... had he? Shaking his head he actually thought on the girl's name. It seemed the only sane part of this whole mess. A name, a nice normal, ordinary name. Definitely needs to be ordinary!

"Jillian?" He said hesitantly.

"Excellent! Thank you very much Daddy. I suppose you should call me Jill? Yes, that sounds perfect."

When your mother first told you that your family would be hosting a foreign exchange student for a semester, you didn't think that it'd be anything special, and you certainly weren't wild about sharing your room with somebody for five months. But that all changed when you first laid eyes on your new roommate. Though at fourteen he was two years younger than you, Brandon had a calm, confident demeanor that you were instantly attracted to, not to mention a slender, athletic body. Being in more advanced classes back home in Taiwan, the school decided to have him mirror your schedule, and you became fast friends.

The past four and a half months have flown by, and the attraction you had when you first met him has now blown into an all-out crush. You've been hesitant to try and see if Brandon reciprocates your feelings, not sure if the flirtiness you detect from him is sincere or just a cultural difference. But now it's the weekend before Brandon has to return home, and you realize that it'd eat at you forever if you didn't at least try to see how he felt about it too.

Luckily, your parents were called away to attend to an emergency with your mother's aunt up in New Jersey, which meant that you and Brandon had the house alone to yourself. Well, almost alone. Sure, your twelve-year-old brother Skylar was still here, but he kept mostly to himself, staying in his bedroom on the computer with the door closed, so except for meals it would be like he wasn't even there.

As you watched your parents' car back out of the driveway and head off to the airport, your heart started to beat a little faster. This was it, you realized. You had promised yourself to talk to Brandon tonight about this, and it did no good to put it off any longer. You walked into the living room, where Brandon was sitting on the sofa, watching television, and you sat down on next to him.

"They're gone?" he asked, gesturing towards the door.

"Yeah," you nodded. "Here begins the best weekend of lives!"

Brandon chuckled at you and shook his head. "The way you're talking, Taylor, I would almost think you had something big planned."

He looked up, smiling softly, and you for a moment you suspected that he somehow knew what you wanted to talk to him about. "Well, its not really something planned... it's ... more like something I ... I guess that I..." Geez, why did the words suddenly become so difficult to say, you thought. "...I wanted to talk to you about."

"Oh?" Brandon's eyes widened a little but the smile remained on his lips.

"Yeah..." You had thought out and practiced what you were going to say in this situation for the past two days, but all of that seemed to have disappeared from your mind now. "I guess... we've known each other for a few months now. Right?"

"Nearly five months, Taylor. That's why I'm leaving next week, remember?"

Your cheeks began to get red a little, but you swallowed and continued. "Exactly. And I think we've become really close friends since then. Wouldn't you agree?"

"Taylor..." The few seconds it took Brandon to pause and gather his thoughts seemed to stretch on for hours. "I would say that you're my closest friend. Closer than anyone I've ever met before, even back home. I feel like... I can be myself around you, you know?"

Time suddenly caught back up with you, and your head began to pound. "Wow..." You couldn't find anything else to say; you were so overwhelmed.

"And..." Brandon continued, placing his hand on your shoulder, "I have something I want to tell you."

"What?" You didn't mean for your question to sound so startled, but this definitely wasn't something you had planned for. "I mean, go ahead. Tell me."

Brandon stared at you for a moment. "There's no one else that knows what I'm about to say, Taylor. Not even my family or friends back at home. That's how much I'm trusting you with this."

Your mind swirled with the possibilities of what he could be about to say. Was it possible that he had picked up on your attraction and was about to tell you what you had been going to tell him?

"This might be hard to believe," he said, "but I promise you it's true, and I'll be able to prove it. But, Taylor..." Brandon closed his eyes, taking a deep breath. "I'm a god."

You blinked. "A god?" The words didn't even make sense in your ears, at least at first. It was so counter to anything you had been expecting. And it really didn't make any sense at all. "You mean... Wait, what DO you mean?"

Brandon stood up, walking towards the window. "I mean I have divine powers. I can... control things, and change things. Hear people's thoughts. Really, I can do pretty much whatever I want."

You were stunned. No, stunned was too weak a word for how you were feeling. You were flabbergasted. Floored. Completely and utterly confused and thrown for a loop. None of those cliches seemed to even come close to how you felt. What Brandon had said was preposterous, you knew. But yet, you had come to know him as one of the most honest people you had ever met, and the way he said it seemed so sincere... What if...

"Wait a second." Something he had said just clicked with you. "You can hear people's thoughts?" You began to think that maybe you weren't so wrong when you thought he might have known what you were about to say.

Amazement, horror, and disbelief all filled your head at once. "But... But..." You suddenly realized the implications of what he had said. "I baked them myself" replied Maddy.
"Can I please have another one?" you asked greedily.
"Of course! The whole bag is for you." smiled Maddy "I'm glad you like them. Actually, you should probably save a few for your parents. But you're invited to come around to my house some time and I'll bake you some more!"
"I'd love to!"

A few minutes later you were unloading the last of the boxes from the van.
"Who was that at the door earlier?" asked your mum.
"Just some girl who wanted to give us cookies. They're really delicious. Want one?" you asked, your mouth full of cookie dough, as you held out the bag.
"How much of your pocket money did you waste on those?"
"They were free. She said it was a welcome gift."
"How thoughtful of her! Did you say thank you?"
"I ... think so?"
"That's good. Leave some on the counter for dad and I."
"Okay, mum."
1341.title: First meeting with a goddess

choices: Maddy's cookies make Josh stronger
Maddy's cookies make Josh taller
Maddy's cookies have some other effect on Josh
13412.content:
Well here it was. You’re fifteen years old and you’re walking through the doors of high school on the first day of the school year. You receive your class schedule at the front counter and you go to a classroom where you wait for the teacher to show up. Finally, when the teacher arrives, you sit down in the back and you nervously wait for your name to be called. The lady reads the names in order and you look over as every student raised their hand as when they hear their name being called.

Then, it happens. A familiar face. A familiar name.

“Madison Grace Jacobs”.

“Here!”

You look over and you recognize here. It’s her! The girl next door! The girl who delivered those delicious chocolate cookies! What a relief. At least there is one person you know who you can talk to.

“Joshua Keenan Jackson”.

“Here!”

She turns towards you and a big grin forms on her face.

An hour later, when class is over, you walk out of the classroom and Maddy meets you in the hallway. You were happy that class was over since it was nothing more than a discussion of class schedule, rules and the class materials, so it was extremely boring.

“Well, Joshua! Now I know your name!” she says to you.

“You can call me Josh… I’m so happy to see you here, Maddy!” You smile as you pat her on her shoulder. “I couldn’t stop thinking about your delicious cookies!”

“You’re welcome to come over to my house after school, you know?” she says to you. “My parents will probably be at work…”

“I might take you up on that! When I get to my house, it’s still a matter of unpacking and straightening out stuff in my room. Moving is so much work!” you groan.

“Oh! I’ll come over and help you!” Maddy offers. “I’m really good at organizing stuff!”

“You don’t have to do that! I got books and papers and clothes and—”

“Oh, stop! It’s not a problem! We’ll go to your house after class!” she insisted.

You just stop arguing and you accepted her offer. So, just as she said, you meet her after class and you walk back to the house together. She didn’t seem to mind it at all. You feel guilty asking her to help out fixing up your bedroom, but she doesn’t seem to care one bit.

Once you arrive at the house, you let her in and you walk straight to your bedroom with Maddy in tow. When you open the bedroom door, you feel ashamed and embarrassed. The drawers of your dresser are still open and empty. Your closet is still open and disorganized. There are boxes all over the bedroom with books, clothes and binders with all your school notes. You have boxes with music CD’s in the corner. You got two other boxes with sports posters rolled up in another corner. You got three pairs of soccer cleats and your tennis and soccer gear all over the floor. You got your clothes all over your bed. You got five boxes with dress clothes, school clothes, clothes for going out, party clothes, church clothes, sports uniforms, swimming gear and more all over the place. Then there’s the laptop with stacks of computer books, CD’s with games, the flat screen monitor, and all the wires all over the place. Your bedroom is a complete and total mess! You realize it would take hours to get everything cleaned up!

“We can do this, Josh! No problem!” Maddy smiles.

“Well, we may as well get started. Here, let me go to the kitchen and get us something to drink, okay? Do you like a Coke, Sprite, some juice or some water?” you offer her.

“Oh, water will be just fine, Josh!” Maddy giggles.

“No problem This will take us the entire afternoon, if we even get it all done, which I seriously doubt!” you sigh. What a horrible way to spend the afternoon with such a cute girl. You hate it!

So, you groan as you walk over to the kitchen. You can’t stand this situation. Why did you have to move? You were so happy at your old place. You just grumble and complain in the back of your mind as you grab two plastic cups out of the kitchen cupboard and you fill them with ice and cold water from the fridge. Then, you carefully walk back to your bedroom as you try very hard NOT to spill any water over the floor as you’re walking back to the room.

Once you arrive at your bedroom, you’re shocked to see what Maddy had done during the three minutes while you were getting the water for the two of you to drink.

“Here is the water for us to dr—” you say as you suddenly notice that the room is all clean, organized, and picked up while Maddy is sitting on the edge of your bed. “HOLY SHIT!”

The boxes are neatly stashed in the hallway. All the clothes are folded and put away in the dresser. Your posters are pinned up on the walls in the bedroom. Your laptop is connected and up and running with all the cables connected. All the books are neatly stored in the two large bookcases. All the CD’s are carefully placed in the large CD storage stand next to the desk. Your bed is clean, the floor is clean, the bed is made up. Your soccer cleats are put away in the closet. Your tennis and swimming gear is stored away in the other closet. Your entire bedroom is all tidy and picked up. And, Maddy did it all by herself in under three minutes while you were getting some water for her to drink.

“Uhh… What… Why… H-H-How…. How d-d-did you do that?” you stutter as you slowly look around the room. You pinch yourself in the arm. You think you must be dreaming! “M-m-my room! It’s like… Amazing!”

“I told you I was really good at organizing things, Josh!” Maddy smiled.

“B-b-but… You did this in…. a few minutes! I’m… What the heck!” you stutter as you sit down next to her. “This is impossible!”

“Oh, Josh…. You’re so cute!” she chuckled. “Now we need to go to my house and get some more cookies!”

“B-b-but…”

“Come on, let’s go to my place! You’ll like it! I promise!” Maddy insisted! “It’s right next door!”

You get up and follow her out the door and across the lawn to her house. You’re still wondering how on Earth she managed to clean up your room in under three minutes!

What other surprises await you as you learn more about this mysterious girl?

You still were puzzled at how Maddy was able to do it so quickly. You glanced at Maddy. She did not appear to be tired or mad at doing all the work. Her face appeared to be too perfect. And she appeared to be confident and smart too.

Maddy gently tugged you toward to the kitchen of her house.

Try these two. Don't worry. You are not going to get fat. She said

134121.title: Maddy's cookies make Josh stronger

choices: Josh wakes up and his calves are bulging with muscle
Josh wakes up and his pectorals are expanding
Josh wakes up and his abs are extremely well-defined
1341213.content:
You give Maddy a shy, embarrassing glance. You have always been a twig in school. You never had any muscle and you weren’t known to be very athletic at all.

“Please, Josh. Please flex those arms for me…” she pleads with you. You wonder WHY she wants you to show off your skinny bones which you call your arms.

You raise up your right arm and flex. Of course, your long-sleeve shirt covers everything. Then, using your left hand, you pull back the long sleeve. What you uncover is utterly amazing!

Your forearms are as thick and as wide as bowling pins. They are completely covered by long, thick veins as well. And then, you see this big, round, rock-hard mound of muscle between your shoulder and your elbow. Is that a bicep? Maddy reaches out with her hand and she rubs her hand over this huge ball of muscle that is sticking out on top of your arm like a swollen bowling ball.

“Aww… You’re so strong, Josh! Let’s see that other arm!” she says.

You switch arms and you use your right arm to pull back the left shirt sleeve. In fact, you just take off the sweater altogether, revealing your ultra-muscular arms!

“I just love a guy with big arms…” Maddy purrs as she runs her soft palm of her hand over your HUGE left bicep while you look on in complete disbelief. Are those YOUR arms? And, YOUR muscles? “You’re so strong, so powerful…. And, so… Manly! And, you’re just getting stronger and stronger every day…” she trails off quietly.

“Uhh…. What? Huh? Say what?”

“You’re gonna be the biggest and the strongest kid in the whole school, Josh….” She grinned at you. “Because you just wear those huge muscles so well!”

“Aww… what… what are you talking about?”

“You will be a very cool, very muscular boy…. It is your…. Destiny!” Maddy whispered as she ran her soft hand over your pecs and thin abs. “You got the heart of a muscle guy who loves to help people!”

“I… I… I don’t know what you’re talking about!” you respond shyly. “But… I gotta get back home soon. I still got some homework to do!”

“Okay, Josh! I’ll see you in school tomorrow!” Maddy grins as she runs her hand over your quads. They’re not big… Not YET!

“Okay…. See ya tomorrow, Maddy! Thanks again for the cookies!”

You turn around and you stroll back to your house, which is right next door. You like Maddy although she seems a little strange. You wonder what she might be talking about? How does she know you’ll become big and strong? Will she get you a free gym membership? You wonder about that.

You get home and you do some reading and studying at your desk in your bedroom.

That night, you go to sleep. Everything seems normal, until….
1341213.title: are almost the strongest boy in school...almost.

choices: Maddy encourages you to try out for one of the top sports teams
You meet some of the other students at the school
13412132.content:
You lazed about on a hammock by the beach, relaxing your big, muscular body in the warmth of the tropical sun. As you basked in the sounds of waves crashing on the shore and the fresh island air, you heard the sounds of your loving girlfriend walking up to you.

"Hey Josh" said Maddy happily, wearing a tight, pink one-piece swimsuit that flaunted her impossibly beautiful body "Enjoying your dream?"
"Oh yeah, this is ... hey wait, did you just say this is only a dream?"
"Well ... maybe I can make it happen for real one day" replied Maddy with a wink "For now, let's enjoy the moment..."
With that she leaned in for a long, deep kiss...

***

You awoke from a wonderful wet dream to the sounds of your alarm. To your annoyance you couldn't remember anything concerning what your dream was about, other than that it was the best dream you'd ever had. With a sigh, you swiped on your phone to dismiss the alarm and pulled your nightshirt off your chest, as it was clinging weirdly tightly to your body. Then, still feeling a quite tired you wandered over to the bathroom.

Your mum was in the kitchen making herself a coffee, when she heard you scream from the bathroom. Moments later came the sounds of you running through the house.
"Mum! Mum!" you called out.
"I'm right here, sweetie" she said calmly, as she finished making her coffee and took the first sip from her cup.

Immediately you barged into the room, naked except for your underwear. "Mum! Look!" you cried hysterically "What's happened?"
"Hmm ..." mused your mum as she looked you over "Well, you're still the same old Joshua I love. Why, what's wrong?"
"Look right here" you said as calmly as you could manage, pointing to your pecs, which seemed to be about 50% larger than the day before "And tell me that's normal."
"Oh, have you been working out? They do look a bit bigger" said your mum "Kind of cute actually. Must have been all that lifting you've been doing. And your room ... I mean wow, that's the tidiest your room has ever been."
"Mum, pectoral muscles don't grow like this overnight" you argued "I know I'm going through puberty and everything, but..."
"You haven't been taking drugs have you?" asked your mum.
"No!" you replied defensively "I mean, not unless muscles grow from eating cookies, but you ate the cookies too and you still look normal."
"I think you shouldn't worry about it" replied your mum, taking another sip from her coffee.

Half an hour later, you walked out of the house feeling ashamed. You'd put on as much school uniform as you could to hide your increasingly muscular arms and pecs, but it was fairly futile. You hoped nobody would notice.

Immediately after you entered the school gates, somebody put their hands over your eyes.
"Guess who?" came an unmistakably cute voice from behind you.
"Hmmm ... Maddy?" you asked.
"You guessed it! Hi Josh!" said Maddy, happily moving her hands away from your eyes and beaming at you. Immediately you noticed her hairstyle was different: she'd cut it much shorter than before.
"Hey, you got a haircut!"
"Oh, I'm glad you noticed. Do you like it?"
"I think it looks great, actually."
"I think you do, too" Maddy purred, running one hand down your chest.
"Yeah, my mum thinks this is just all the housework I've been doing" you said shyly with a forced attempt at a laugh "I'm sure these muscles will go away as fast as they came, especially if you help me out like you helped with my room."
"No, I think you'll keep these forever" she said, sounding strangely commanding as she did so.
There was a moment of awkward silence. "Uhm ... well, if you think so" you said uneasily.
"Come on, we'll be late for class!" cheered Maddy, holding your hand and walking off with you following.
13412132.title: Josh wakes up and his pectorals are expanding

choices: Soccer tryouts went awesome - Team Captain!
Soccer tryouts went well - Striker or Midfielder!
Soccer tryouts went okay - Goalie!
Soccer tryouts were amazing! Josh is on the team!
134121321.content:
You follow Maddy to class and you sit down. The only available chair is the one… Next to Maddy! Amazing! You grin as you sit down, and you grab your notebook and pencil. The teacher writes the math problems on the board and you copy them down. Right away, you know the answers and you know how to work the problems. You do all the problems in class.

Maddy looks over at your notebook.

“Oh, Josh. Explain to me how you did that problem? I don’t get it…” she smiles. “You’re so smart!”

“Uhh… Sure… I guess…” you stutter as you look up at the teacher for approval.

“Yes, Josh, it’s alright to help each other out. In fact, you and Maddy are always allowed to sit together and to work together, for the rest of the school year!” the teacher stated.

“Uhh… Thanks, Mr. Jones!” you smile, as Maddy grins at you.

“Here, I just figured this part and then I wrote my answer here before I figured out the problem on the right side…” you explain patiently.

“Josh… You’re so cute, so patient, so smart, and…. So handsome!” Maddy whispers to you in your ear. “I love you…”

You stop and look at her. You’re speechless. You just smile as your face turns red.

“Uhh…”

“Sorry! I made you blush! Hehe! Okay, let’s focus on math again! My bad!” Maddy giggles as she pays attention to your math problem in your notebook.

You explain the math problem to her, and she finally understands it. She gets the problem right and she smiles at you the whole time.

When the bell rings, you get your bag and you walk out into the hallway, but Maddy is right behind you. You stop and read the posters on the big bulletin board. One of them has the words “SOCCER TRYOUTS” on it.

“Josh! Why don’t you try out for the boys’ soccer team? You’d do so well at it!” Maddy blurts out. “I’m already on the girls’ team! We would have practice at the same time! That’s so awesome!”

“Oh, I don’t know! Some guys are in better shape than me! I don’t think I have much of a chance…” you sigh as you read the date and time for the soccer tryouts at the soccer field.

“Please do it anyway! You’ll do great! I think you’re in great shape! You have strong arms and legs… I think you’ll make the team… Easily!” Maddy stated. “I’ll be there to cheer you on! I promise!”

“Okay! Deal! I’m only coming to soccer tomorrow if you’re there, Maddy!” you say as you give her a handshake.

“It’s a deal, Josh! I know you’ll make the team!” Maddy grinned.

“Why are you so certain I qualify for the soccer team?” you ask her. “Do you know the coach?”

“No… I just know it because… It’s your destiny!” she responds. “See you here tomorrow afternoon!”

Everything went extremely well between school and the following afternoon. The bus was on time, dinner was delicious, homework was a breeze, you slept like a log, you work up feeling fit, refreshed and strong… It was almost like something – or someone – was helping you from above….
134121321.title: Maddy encourages you to try out for one of the ...

choices: You take Maddie on a date after the soccer match
Maddie spends the night at your house
You and Maddie go to a dance
You and Maddie go camping in the woods
You and Maddie do something else together
1341213211.content:
You went to class, just as you had planned. Classes went very well. You had three quizzes and you aced all three of them. You had one test and you scored a 100% on that. For some reason, the tests were just… Too easy! High school had never seemed this easy to you before. Everybody left you alone during recess and the jerks who normally bullied you stayed far away from you. It was almost as if the bigger jocks were afraid of you for some reason. Homework was a breeze and you finished within an hour and the ride on the school bus went without any incident at all. The day just seemed perfect!

You showed up at the soccer field for the freshman soccer tryouts not knowing what to expect. You didn’t have high expectations at all, but your promised Maddie that you’d come, so here you were. As you looked around, you spotted her, running around on the soccer pitch, wearing white shorts, jersey and black cleats. She waved at you as soon as you looked her way. Gosh, this girl was so incredibly cute!

The soccer coach arrived with a large bag filled with balls. He blew the whistle and signaled for you to get on the pitch. He lined up several balls in a row and ordered you to make some shots on goal. One-by-one, you kicked each ball in, nice, hard and steady. Every ball went through and entered through one of the corners before hitting the back of the net. The coach smiled, before asking another boy to stand before you and the goal.

The coach blew the whistle again and told you to dribble the ball past the defender. He gave you three tries to make it. Every time he blew the whistle, he managed to get the ball past the other boy by kicking the ball through his legs and by dribbling around him and then by finishing it off with a clean shot into the goal. You could hear the comments of the onlookers who were standing along the side of the pitch and you could sense that they were all impressed by your footwork.

Finally, the coach placed several sticks and cones on the pitch, and he rolled a soccer ball towards you, with instructions to dribble the ball between all the cones before passing it at least five times back and forth to another player before making a shot on goal. So, you use your feet to run as fast as possible between all the cones, controlling the ball and sending it before you, keeping it in the lanes between the cones in an impressive show of ball control using only your cleats. You run through all the cones before sending the ball to the other player, who is running down the pitch towards the empty goal. He sends the ball back, and the two of you pass the ball back-and-forth to each other before you make a nice, clean shot on goal.

Lastly, your soccer partner passes the ball to you from the corner, while you stand before the goal. With every receiving pass, you head the ball into the goal, you volley the ball in, or you leap into the air and you manage to punch the ball in with an amazing bicycle kick, as you leap high in the air, flip your body around so you’re upside-down with both legs pointing towards the sky and punching the ball into the goal with your cleat. You repeat the drill with one man standing in the goal, and you score every time you touch the ball. The people standing on the sidelines are very impressed as you clearly hear the comments as you wander over to the bench.

“Wow, that kid is really good!”

“What’s his name again? Josh? He’s outstanding!”

“This kid can turn pro!”

“This guy is making all the right shots!”

“This kid is fun to watch!”

Finally, another player walks up to you. He has the bold letter “C” on his uniform. He’s the Captain of the team. As he approaches you, he pulls the shirt off.

“Josh, you need to take off your jersey!” he orders you.

“Huh? Oh… Okay…” you just shrug, not knowing what is going on. You remove your jersey.

“Josh… I can’t compete with you, dude. You got way more talent than me, man. You can do things with a soccer ball that I can’t even do at all! You’re the best I’ve ever seen! Not only that, but… I can tell you’re working out in the gym as well…” the boy says to you.

“What? What are you talking about?” I ask him.

“Look at your legs! I can’t compete with that!”

You look down at your own legs and realize that your quads and calves are massive! Your quads are so big, that they look like they’re about to burst out of your shorts. They are big, thick, wide mounds of muscle filled with thick vertical muscle cords running from your waist to your knees. No wonder you’re not feeling tired. Your legs are totally pumped up with muscle. Not to mention, your calves are as big and as wide as melons. Your legs are totally ripped, and you look like a pro soccer star! Clearly, your legs are much more muscled than the other boy’s!

“Anyway, here is my jersey! You’re gonna be the team Captain from now on!” the boy said, as he placed the shirt with the big letter “C” over your head.

“What? Are you sure?” you ask him. Holy crap! The kid who was the team Captain just handed you the title!

“Yeah! You deserve it, Josh! Congratulations! You’re in charge!” he said before he stepped back.

Then, before you could react, all the other fourteen guys walked up to you. The entire soccer team stood before you, awaiting your instructions. You had never expected this! This meant that for sure you had made it through the tryouts, and you were just awarded the title of Team Captain! Holy smoke!

“Uhh… Okay, guys! Let’s shut down the passing lanes between the opposing team and let’s block all shots on our goal! We need to be aggressive and attack their goal and keep the pressure on their goalie! Let’s play hard and WIN this! Go, go, Goooo!” you shout as your teammates cheer you on. You run down the pitch with the rest of the team in tow as Maddie looks on from the other field. After you win your first game, she’ll be waiting for you by the sidelines to congratulate you…

14.content:
You are an all-powerful kid! But just who are you? (As you are a diety, you may change forms at any time but will remain of the mindset of your original form.)

OPTION 1: You are a young boy (early elementary) who is unaware of his powers, making changes randomly or on whims.

OPTION 2: Same as Option 1 but as a young girl.

OPTION 3: You are a teenage boy in high school, fully aware of your powers.

OPTION 4: Same as Option 3 but as a teenage girl.
14.title: You, yourself, are the Godchild

choices: Rishon makes another change to Kai by growing his muscle
Rishon changes another kid at school
Rishon changes another kid on the soccer team
141.content:
Two young boys walked in the small convenience store located within a residential area of town. The boys were both eight years old and they were in the third grade while attending the same school and the same class together. It was Friday afternoon, just after 6 o’clock, and the boys strolled in from their house, which was only two blocks from the store. Everything seemed normal to them, however, one boy would gain the powers of a god that day and become omnipotent!

In fact, the boy already had the powers. He just couldn’t use them, until now, because they were dormant. This was the day the powers were awakened.

Kai Wen and Rishon Kadam strolled into the store, hoping to get some delicious candy after a long day of boring classes at school and a grueling practice session on the soccer field behind the church down the street. Both boys wear still wearing their uniforms and soccer cleats as they wandered around the candy aisle.

Rishon’s parents were from Southern India and moved to Florida about ten years ago. Rishon was born in a Miami hospital and he pretty much grew up as a typical American kid, even though he had chocolate brown skin and jet black, straight hair with deep brown eyes. He was slender but athletic since he was always chasing a soccer ball or trying to hit a tennis ball somewhere. The boy was about 4-foot-8 inches tall and he was always wearing shorts with tennis shoes or soccer cleats.

The story was the same for Kai except for the fact that his parents were originally from Hong Kong. Kai was also born in Miami where his dad ran a small restaurant in a strip mall close to the beach. Kai would occasionally help on weekends when he was not playing soccer with Rishon. Kai was athletic as well, standing 4-foot-6 inches tall with black hair and blue eyes.

“Gosh, darn it! I can’t reach the top shelf!” Kai grumbled as he stood on his toes with his arm extended all the way while he tried his best to grab a box of candy from the shelf which was just slightly out of reach. “Urrhhh!!”

“Man! You need to grow another three inches, dude!” Rishon chuckled, as he looked on at his Chinese friend. “You’re too short!”

Something weird happened. Kai suddenly felt a weird prickling sensation is his short legs, from his calves all the way up to his quads. Then, within a few seconds, it seemed as if the top shelf had come closer… Or did he just become taller?

“There! I got it!” Kai grinned, as he grabbed the box from the shelf. He stood back on his feet and turned to face his Indian pal. “It’s only two bucks! We can buy this!”

“Good deal… But… You’re taller than me now!” Rishon noted.

Suddenly, Kai was an inch taller than Rishon! What happened?

“Wha? What’s going on here?” the Chinese boy wondered as he looked around. “You SHRUNK!”

“Come on! People don’t shrink, dude! You just got a few inches taller!” Rishon shrugged.

“I could have sworn you were a few inches taller than me a minute ago?” Kai pondered. “That’s weird!”

“Well, let’s pay for this so we can walk back to my house!” Rishon suggested.

The boys walked up to the cashier and paid for the candy. Then they strolled back to Rishon’s house, which was right next to Kai’s place. They didn’t think much of Kai’s sudden growth spurt, until the next occasion came up where Rishon would use his amazing powers as the new GodChild…
141.title: Young Boy

choices: Gym Class
Swim Practice
Invite the kid over for dinner
143.content:
WILLIAM GRAYSON KING

You looked at the name printed on your schedule. You prefered your initials, but until you got established here you would have to answer to William. You had just moved to a new school in the city where your dad had gotten a job. You say "Dad", but you were actually adopted; your real parents, whoever they were, had abandoned you on the steps of an orphanage as an infant. If they could only see what you were now, they might have been smart enough to keep you.

Your first class was gym, which was fine by you. You were hoping to check out the pool, as you planned to join the swim team. You had been state champion back at your old school in Kansas, but then there weren't a great number of swimmer's in that state. You were anxious to find out what California had to offer.

After peeking into the pool area, you headed for the locker room. But once inside, you realized you weren't alone. On the far side of the room, hidden from any wandering teachers by a row of lockers, two large bullies were harassing a smaller kid, probably a ninth grader. You knew you had to help, but you didn't want to create a scene on your first day.

"Hey, kid, what're you doin' here?" one of them guffawed. "Shouldn't you be down in the elementary?"

"Tell you what," the other said, "if you give us you're lunch money, we won't turn you in for bein' up here."

The kid knew where this was going, and was trying to avoid confrontation by doing absolutely nothing. He did not speak, did not move, did not show any emotion on his face. He would be hard to play poker with. But the bullies were getting bored.

"What are ya? Stupid? I said give me your money!"

Suddenly, the bullies had their underwear over their heads and their wallets came out of their pockets to repeatedly slap them in the face. The two ran out of the locker room, yelling for help while the kid looked stunned. You tried to leave, but he spotted you.

"How did you do that?" he asked, his voice quivering slightly. So much for not making a scene. You would blame him for losing his poker face, but then, who wouldn't?

"I don't know what you're talking about," you try to shove it off.

"Bullshit."

"Okay, so maybe I did do it, but you have to figure it out for yourself."

"Aw come on, it's not like I have a giant group of friends to run and tell."

The kid's unfallible logic was actually making you consider, but you still had reservations. Your powers allowed you to alter any physical or dimensional aspect of your world and impose influence on peoples' thoughts, but free will was ultimately their choice. If this kid chose to run and tell someone, you could make him a mute, or make the other person deaf, but that seemed kind of drastic.

"How about you spend the week trying to prove I can trust you," you told him. "On Friday, I'll consider revealing my secret."

He seemed mildly disappointed, but followed you to the gym. It turned out it was a mixed-grade gym class that he shared with you and the bullies. They were still rubbing their asses from the wedgies and had forced their wallets back into their pockets. They had a look of suspicion and fear as they saw the kid. You laughed inwardly.

"This ought to be a fun school."
143.title: Teenage Guy

choices: You transform Mr. Buckner to make him less intimidating.
You cause some more subtle changes that get back at him.
You simply use your wits to stand up to him.
1431.content:
As you leaned against the padded wall, observing the class, the small boy you helped out in the locker room walked up to you with a nervous smile on his face.Â ”T-thanks again for helping me back there,” he said, mumbling his words as he tried to brush his long dark bangs away from his eyes.Â ”Whatever it was that you did.”

You smiled in return and nodded.Â ”Whatever it was,” you repeated.Â 

”So what do I have to do to prove that you can trust me?” he asked, scrunching up his nose as he looked at you.Â ”I'm dying to find out how you did that.”

You shrug.Â ”I don’t really have anything specific that I’m looking for. Just be yourself this week, and we'll see.”Â 

Sighing, he slumped his shoulders a little, obviously disappointed in your answer. Â ”Fine...”

Seeing him dejected like this made you start to second-guess your decision, but you knew that you had to learn more about him and see if he would prove himself on his own terms. Still, it wouldn't hurt to help him out a little. Â ”Maybe it would help if we knew each other’s names. I’m Brandon, by the way,” you said, sticking out your hand.Â 

The boy looked down at your hand, seemingly unsure of what to do with it for a second before finally grabbing it and shaking.Â ”Ashton,” he replied.Â ”My friends call me Ash. That is, they would if...” His voice trailed off as he looked away, but you knew what he was trying to say.

”That’s okay, Ash,” you said as you tried to smile reassuringly, not confident that you succeeded.Â ”Freshman year can be tough. I know mine was, back in Kansas.”

Ash’s eyes widened.Â ”Kansas? I wouldn't have guessed you were from there. You don't have an accent or anything.”Â 

Chuckling, you shook your head. ”Most people from where I'm from don't. I grew up outside Kansas City; my house was half a mile from the Missouri state line.”

”Ah. Okay.” He looked to be lost in thought for a moment, then suddenly turned back to you with a look of embarrassment in his eyes.Â ”I, uh, I hope I didn't offend you or anything. I wasn't trying to imply you were a hick or something. Not that being from Kansas would make you a hick-- that is--” As Ash kept talking, he started to look more and more nervous, sweat starting to form on his brow.

”Ash, relax,” you said, placing a hand on his shoulder. ”I wasn't offended.” As you touched him, you decided to use your powers to help him out a little, causing his body to calm down slightly and returning his heart rate to a normal level.

”Good.” He didn't seem to notice your intervention, and he grew silent for a few minutes. As he did, you looked around at the rest of your classmates. It seemed to be about fifty percent freshman like Ash, the rest made up of a mixture of transfers from other states like you, older students who didn't pass gym their first year, and born jocks for whom taking a gym class was the only worthwhile reason to go to school. Though the bell had rung three minutes ago, the teacher had yet to get started, so most of the class had split into three or four groups and were chatting about their summers, movies and TV shows they had seen, and tryouts for several fall sports that were happening this week. You noticed the two bullies had joined a group with two other older looking kids, all of whom were talking in lower tones, occasionally glaring your direction, though you weren't sure if they were looking at you or Ash.

”Okay, lunkheads, shut your mouths and listen up!” The voice of the gym teacher had startled several students, booming from the doorway where he had just entered from.Â ”My name is Mr. Buckner, and I get the wondrous privilege to teach gym to all of you 'leaders of tomorrow'." These last words were dripping with sarcasm, punctuated by Mr. Buckner rolling his eyes as he said them. "We all know that this is probably the last place any of us want to be after a nice relaxing summer, but the state of California forces you to be here, and my mortgage and child support payments force my sorry ass to be here, so we’re all going to have to learn to liveÂ with it.”Â 

Though most of the rest of the class is looking up at Mr. Buckner with a mixture of horror and disgust, you can't help but find his display a little amusing, and you chuckle. Immediately, he spins in your direction, glaring menacingly at you.Â ”What was that?!” He stomped your direction, the other groups of students moving out of his way as he passed.Â 

Standing directly in front of you, he leaned in, snarling almost like a wild dog. In your peripheral vision, you could see Ash visibly trembling, though he remained by your side, either too scared to move or not willing to leave the closest thing he had to a friend in this school. You seemed to be the only one in the gym who wasn't intimidated by Mr. Buckner-- of course, you were also the only one who could, without moving a muscle, shrink him down to the size of a flea, or crunch his body into the form of a ball and cause him to go flying through the air into one of the basketball hoops. Maybe it was time for the gym teacher to be taught a lesson...

Looking at your reflection in the back window, you saw a female version of yourself. Deciding to add the finishing touches, your clothes transformed into a two piece bikini. “Excuse me?” You ask, playing the part. “Why did you come here without permission?”

“I… er… just… friend?” Ash stammered, unable to form a coherent sentence. His face had grown scarlet from embarrassment and you laughed internally.

Then you decided too…

14313.content:
None of that would be necessary now, you decided. Mr. Buckner, however, had clearly identified who the chuckle had come from, and screamed right in front of your nose, spittle flying into your eyes. ”Was that you laughing, maggot?”

You didn't even wince, however, simply answering, ”Yes.”

”And just what do you find so funny,” he said, pausing for a second as he looked down to check a stack of papers he was holding, which you could see had a list of students' names along with small head shots, ”Brandon W Andrews?”

You thought for a moment of how to best answer his question. ”Well, for starters, you're kind of reminding me of that drill sergeant guy from Full Metal Jacket, and I always thought he was pretty hilarious.”

Mr. Buckner’s eyes softened for just a moment, and you wondered if you had hit exactly the description he was going for (after all, you figure everyone in California wants to be in the movies). But the fire quickly returned, and he started yelling even louder. ”So, what, will you be the Joker, then? Well, la-di-freaking-da. We've got ourselves a bona-fide movie buff, boys and girls.” He shook his head, smiling in a cruel, sadistic way. ”Tell you what, Joker. You can be the star of the show. Because every day this week, you’re gonna be running laps for the entire class! Any questions?”

Well, there could be worse punishments, you thought. For now, it would be best to just go along with it. Shaking your head without saying a word, you then quickly started running along the outer edge of the gym, as the rest of the class stared at you in horror.

”All right, then,” Mr. Buckner's voice boomed across the entire gymnasium, ”does Mr. Joker have any friends who want to ’co-star' with him? If so, just speak up, and you can run laps the entire week too!”

You shook your head, turning the corner and facing away from the rest of the class. You sincerely doubted anyone would take him up on his offer to join you, and you wondered just why this little speck of a man felt a need to intimidate and verbally abuse a bunch of teenagers.

”All right, pipsqueak! Start running! Now!” 

At first, you thought you had misheard, but as you brought your head up, you noticed the figure of another student starting to run along the edge of the walls. As you looked closer, you realized that it was Ash! You couldn't believe that anyone would voluntarily subject themselves to this torture (well, at least anyone who didn't have divine powers like you), but something had stirred Ash into joining you. Maybe he could be trusted after all...

As Mr. Buckner started to perform his pathetic excuse for ”teaching”, you slowed your pace to allow Ash to be able to catch up with you. When he did, you looked at him and smiled, him giving you a weak smile in return. ”What did you do that for?” you asked.

”I-- I dunno,” he said in between breaths. ”I just thought it was pretty awesome the way you stood up to him without being at all frightened, and... I didn't want you to be the only one. Besides, I kinda like running. I do it all the time, around the neighborhood and stuff.”

”Hmm,” you said. ”Well, thanks!”

”Don't mention it.” His smile started to broaden, but instantly disappeared when Mr. Buckner shouted at the two of you to stop talking and create some space between the two of you. 

”Hmm,” you thought to yourself, ”if he wants to see space, I can show him space.”

143131.content:
You realize that the class was getting bored with Mr. Buckner and you were getting tired of running laps around the gym. It was time to make something fun happen, and to reward Ash for sticking up for you. First things first. You wanted to reward Ash for really demonstrating his loyalty towards you. You decided that you wanted to use your godly powers to make Ash do something really cool and stand out, in a way. Since he was running laps around the gym with you, why not make him run… faster? A LOT faster?

You intentionally slowed down the pace a bit, allowing for the distance between you and Ash to increase even more. Secondly, you wanted Ash to stay ahead of you. When Ash was far enough ahead of you, that you could see him running right in front of you, you quietly willed for time to freeze in the gym for everyone but you.

Everything stopped and everyone froze. Even Ash froze, while he was in the middle of his stride. In fact, he was practically hovering above the ground as he was running with one leg in front of him and the other behind him. Mr. Buckner and all the other students had completely frozen, and were in suspended animation, standing on the other side of the gym. It was completely silent in the gym; you could hear a pin drop.

You calmly walked up to Ash, who was staring straight in front of him.

“I’m gonna reward you for your loyalty, Ash…” you say in a low voice.

You look down and see his legs. You want him to gain thirty pounds of muscle in his legs, making him resemble a professional track star. In fact, he would almost resemble a runner who had just come back from the Olympics! Ash’s quads inflate with layers upon layers of muscle, growing thicker and wider to the point where veins as thick as ropes covered his quads all over. Next, his calves inflated with raw muscle like balloons attached to an air pump. They grew to the size of melons, filling out until they looked almost too big to be real!

“NOW… Let’s see how fast you’re gonna run, Ash…” you say with a wide grin on your face as you walk back to the point where you were, several feet behind Ash.

You silently wish for time to resume in the gym. All the students resumed talking and Mr. Buckner continued his lecture. Ash continued to run in front of you with one noticeable difference…

“Hey! Look at Ash!” one boy noted.

“Dang! Look at Ash! He’s fast!”

Ash was running faster… MUCH faster than before! Ash had passed the students and he was now completing his lap already. He had just turned the corner and he was already passing me for the second time now!

“Hey Brandon!” Ash said as he blew past me.

You just watched him as he practically left you in the dust. You could tell that all the other guys in class were impressed by Ash’s sudden increase in speed. Now, all you had to do, was take care of Mr. Buckner. You looked over at where he was standing and you silently willed for your beloved gym instructor to suddenly have the incredible urge to go and use the restroom due to an overactive bladder…

“Alright! You two guys can stop running!” Mr. Buckner shouted at you. “Split up into two teams and get a basketball game going! I’ll be right back…”

Mr. Buckner practically ran into the men’s room while you just started shooting hoops. The rest of the class was a lot of fun. Ash was one of the best players on the team, since he was able to run the fastest and jump the highest with his super-muscular legs of his…

1431311.content:
As gym progresses you slowly added muscle to the rest of Ash's frame, and when you returned to the locker rooms he was shock when he took off his shirt and saw the well toned body he now possessed. "This has something to do with you," he said quietly, gesturing to his six-pack.

"Hey Ash, nice abs bro," one of the other kids said, "You should join one of the sports teams, I'm sure we could use a real athlete like you."

You shrugged at Ash and quickly changed so you could get to class quickly. You used your power to instantly wash yourself, without needing the showers, and dashed off to your next class. You promised Ash you'd see him again after school.

The rest of the school day was pretty boring, though there was some interesting chatter that Mr. Buckner, who'd only taught one class, had been called into the principal's office, and the principal didn't look happy when he was doing it. It seemed that calling one's students 'lunkheads', passive-aggressively insulting them, actively insulting them and attempting to force them to run full tilt for almost forty-five minutes were all quite strictly against staff standards. You found it amusing that they hired the man in the first place, but, by the end of the day, word was that he wouldn't be returning for a second day. "And I didn't even have to use my powers once," you muttered to yourself as you waited outside the front for Ash.

When he came out his youthful face was beaming. He still seemed entranced by his muscles, and even with a t-shirt the definition in his arms showed. "Dude! You won't believe it. I got a date, and I got on the track team. I didn't even have to try out, apparently my speed in gym was one of the best a number of students had ever seen. I got recommended and I'm on."

"Congratulations man," you replied, "Wanna ditch our backpacks somewhere first? They could get in our way."

"Where did you have in mind?"

"I think my place is closest. I walked here this morning."

"So did I actually," Ash added, "Want me to show you where I live?"

Ash was so eager to show you where he lived, that all you had to do was use your godly powers to read his mind and to find out what his address was. Then, you snapped your fingers and teleported you and Ash to his bedroom in a fraction of a second.

“Hey!” Ash gasped, as he looked around and realized that he was standing in the middle of his own bedroom. “This… This is my room! We’re here already!”

You just sat on his bed with a grin on your face.

“Yup!” you just smiled.

“How did you do that?” Ash asks you.

“I have godly powers, my friend! I can teleport you anywhere I want!” you respond. “I can also do… THIS!”

Next, you snapped your fingers again, making Ash’s shorts and t-shirt disappear, leaving him standing before you wearing only his jockstrap.

“Hey! What gives?” he asks you.

“I gotta finish fixing you up, now that you got a girlfriend and now that you’re on the track team as well!” you added.

“Yeah but you didn’t say that you were gonna… Whoa!” Ash gasped as he felt his body change.

His upper body grew to match his powerful, muscular legs. His biceps bulged, his chest expanded and his pectorals inflated some more. In fact, you allowed Ash to grow a bit taller as well, until he towered over you at 6 foot 6 inches in height. He had broad shoulders with delts, traps and lats which gave him that V-taper that bodybuilders loved to show off. Ash now resembled a gymnast who was preparing to go to the Olympics!

“Woww! Okay… I was big before… Now I’m huge! I’m a total stud!” Ash grinned as he looked down and examined his amazing body.

“There! All your clothes are adjusted to fit you! How about you wear a tank top and a pair of shorts with a pair of high tops?” you suggest, as you snap your fingers and make these clothes appear on Ash’s well-developed body.

“Oh man! Brandon! You’ve totally dressed me up!” Ash laughed.

“Hey! I take good care of my friends, dude!”

“But… What about you? I mean… You’re making me stand out… But you still look average!” Ash wondered.

“That’s the whole idea, Ash! I like to use my powers to make guys like you stand out. On the other hand, I try very hard NOT to draw any attention to myself. I want to remain very ordinary. Trust me, it’s a lot more fun for me to make a guy like you grow bigger and stronger!” you explain to your bigger, taller and muscular friend.

“Wow! This is so weird! A few days ago, I was smaller than you. Now, I’m a lot taller than you!” Ash laughed.

“Yes! And I prefer it that way! I don’t want to draw any attention to myself. Trust me!”

“So, what do we do now?” Ash asks you.

“Let’s go out…” you reply. “How about we go to…”

143131121.content:
“How about we go to the mall and hang out there?” you suggest to Ash, who is towering over you by a foot and who has over fifty pounds of muscle as he looks down on you.

“Sure… But… Oh crap!” Ash suddenly said with a disappointing look on his face.

“What’s wrong?”

“I just remembered that I had a short homework assignment to do for English class! Darn it! I almost forgot about it!” he groaned. “I gotta take care of that first!”

“No problem! Open up your book and your notebook, big dude!” you order your hulking friend, as he sits down at his desk and opens up his notebook and grabs hold of his fountain pen while he opens his textbook to the page where his assignment is displayed.

“Darn! This may take me an hour to do…” he sighed.

“Not if I can help it, Ash!” you grin.

You silently wish for Ash to do everything at super speed! As soon as you snap your fingers, his super speed kicks in! You just sit down at the edge of his bed, on the other end of Ash’s bedroom and observe as Ash does his homework at lightning speed!

Ash starts reading through several pages of his thick English book! His eyes scan the text of the book at an outrageous speed. He reads an entire page in 3 seconds before he flips the page over to the next one. After a few seconds, he flips the page again! After twenty seconds had passed, Ash had finished reading almost twenty pages at super speed!

Then, Ash grabbed his pen and his notebook and started answering the questions listed in his book. He started writing his answers so fast, that he filled up a page in his notebook in 10 seconds. Then he filled another page and another, until he had written almost 5 pages full of all his answers!

Finally, after about 5 minutes or so, Ash had answered about 15 questions from reading 20 pages for his English class. Normally, this would have taken over an hour, but Ash had completed all the work in only 5 minutes flat.

“Okay, Ash, back to normal speed!” you say, as you snapped your fingers again.

“There! I’m done!” Ash cheered, as he looked at the clock. “Holy crap! I did all that in five minutes?”

“Yeah! You’re a speed-reader… and a speed-writer, dude!” you reply with a smile.

“Whoa! But… Hey! You must’ve helped me!” Ash said, as he got up and walked over to you, folding his big, muscular arms before his bulging chest.

“Like I said before… I take really good care of my friends!”

Then, you stood up before him and snapped your fingers, teleporting the two of you to the entrance of the large shopping mall, which was about six blocks away from Ash’s house.

A tall, muscular teen appeared standing next to an average teen, right before the big glass doors leading to the mall.

“Let’s go in! I want to check out the video game store!” you say to Ash, who walks behind you.

“Okay… I’m… I’m just a little nervous…” he says to you.

“Why? What’s the matter?”

“What if any of my friends recognize me? Won’t they wonder how I got so big and tall?” Ash wondered.

“Don’t worry about that! I changed reality so that everybody will find it perfectly normal the way you are now! Trust me!” you reply.

Just as you had finished saying that, two girls wearing regular t-shirts and blue jeans came walking towards the two of you. One of the girls recognized Ash from school.

“Hey, Ash! What are you doing here?” she said, looking up to the towering, muscular boy. “And, who’s this?”

“Hey, Missy! This is my friend Brandon! He’s new! He also goes to our school now!” Ash explained to the girl who had long blonde hair.

“Hi, Brandon! I’m Missy! I’m in Ash’s English class!” the girl said to you.

“Ash! Did you start on that writing assignment yet? It has this dumb story you gotta read! It’s over twenty pages long! Ohmygosh! Then you gotta answer all these questions! I took over an hour to do it! And I’m still not even done with it yet! Did you even start on that assignment yet?” the girl asked him.

“Umm… I… I started on it…” Ash said shyly.

“Well, be prepared to stay up late for this one tonight! Don’t hang around the mall too late, or you’ll be sorry!” Missy said, as she turned around and started walking away.

Ash then walked up to you and whispered in your ear.

“Oh, man! I was too scared to tell her that I already finished the assignment!” Ash whispered quietly.

“Don’t worry about it!” you reply with a grin. “Oh! Look! Here is the video arcade. I see a few guys from school! And… Right next door to the arcade is… the sporting goods store! Where should we go first?”

You turn and look up to Ash, waiting for him to reply…

143131122.content:
You look at Ash and you can’t help but smile at the towering Goliath you have created out of the short, shy kid he used to be. He is now a tall, 6-foot-6 muscle kid with all the features which make him extremely handsome. So, you’re at his house and you decide to take him to the large public park down the street from your house.

You snap your fingers and the two of you teleport there in a blink of an eye. As soon as we arrive, we walk around, and we notice all the kids staring at Ash. Wearing just a tank top, shorts and gym shoes, all his huge muscles stand out and glow in the bright sun.

The minute we arrive, we hear a commotion. A large crowd of people surrounds a tree. Apparently, some kid climbed up in the tree and is too scared to come back down. None of the onlookers are tall enough to grab the kid, who is sitting on one of the branches… except Ash.

“I’ll help you, kiddo!” the big, tall, muscle guy smiles as he reaches over with his big, long, super-muscular as he easily grabs the kid by the waist and pulls him down. The parents applaud as Ash sets the little boy on the ground and shyly grins before he walks away and turns towards me.

Next, we hear someone shouted from the parking lot. An older man had a flat tired and he can’t find his jack to raise up the side of his car, so he can remove the flat and replace it with a spare.

“I can help you with that!” Ash grins as he flexes his arm before he strolls up to the back of the car, places his hands on the bumper, and casually lifts the rear of the vehicle high enough so the flat tire lifts and off the ground, much to the delight of all the onlookers.

Another gentleman takes a tool and he unscrew the nuts which hold the flat tire in place. He removes the flat and quickly replaces it with the spare. Once he’s done, Ash lowers the car back on the pavement, to the cheers of everyone there.

A small crowd formed around Ash where people of all ages, including other teens and a few adults, started asking the big teen how strong he was and where he worked out, thanking him for all his help. Ash finally walked back to you with a grin on his face.

“Gosh, Brandon… Being big and strong is so cool… It’s so much fun to help all these people… I’m almost beginning to feel like some sort of superhero!” Ash remarks to you.

You smile as you look up to him.

“I can arrange that! Want to be a superhero, for real? Or, I can make you into a big, teen bodybuilder… With even bigger muscles than you got now!” you suggest to him.

Ash pondered your suggestion for a moment and replied…

You realized that all the guys in the gym were talking about Ash's blazing sprin around the gym. Just as the two of you were walking past the lockers, Jason, one of the students athletes, approached you from behind.

"Hey Ash! Ash!" he shouted, as he came running up to your new friend. "I heard that you were a really fast runner and I was wondering if you wanted to join our varsity soccer team? We need new players and I would love to see you on our team!"

"Soccer team? Me? Uhhh... I guess..." he sighed, looking at you. You nodded in return, feeling glad to see his rising popularity. While Ash was still talking to Jason you decided to tweak his body a little and to gradually grow him taller and to make his upper body more muscular so that it matches his muscular legs. You see Ash slowly growing taller and taller, until he's about 6 foot 4 inches tall. You make sure his biceps, his pectorals and his abdominal muscles fill out his skinny frame so that he looks like an even bigger jock than Jason! Finally, Ash walks back up to you, and you're now looking up to him.

"I have my first soccer practice in a few minutes!" he says excitedly. The two of you walk outside and head out to the field. He borrows a pair of cleats from someone and puts them on. Suddenly, he gets up and stands before you.

"Dang! What happened? You shrunk, Brandon!"

"Let's just say... You deserved it!" you replied.

You just grinned in reply.

Then you just smile as you see the big soccer star run on to the field as a group of girls cheer hm on....

"Ash-is-The-Flash! Ash-is-The-Flash!!" they cheered.

You chuckled in silence as you watched the soccer game from the bleachers...

Ash's first soccer practice was a huge success. Not only was Ash one of the fast players on the team, he was also be of the first guys to score a goal as well. Needless to say, that all the payers were very pleased to have him as a part of their soccer team!

Once practice was over, Ash and Brandon started walking home from the soccer field behind the man school building. They decided to cut through the large public park, which took up several city blocks.

While walking through the park and passing several tall trees, Ash had stopped when he heard sounds coming from one of the branches of a tree. When he looked up, he spotted a little kitten, sanding on a branch, anxiously trying to jump down from the high branch.

"Oh no! The kitten is too high up! It's too scared to jump!" Ash noted. "Maybe I can try to climb up the tree and get to the poor kitten?"

The branch was about a dozen feet above the ground, and Ash just wasn't tall enough to reach it by jumping.

"Ash..." you say calmly, as your big, muscular friend walks up to you. "I can help you get to he kitten, but you gotta promise me something, okay?"

"Sure?" he says, while standing right in front of you, with you looking him right in his bulging chest.

"I'm gonna make you even bigger than you are now... Like really BIG! But don't tell anyone that I made you grow, okay?" you whisper to him.

"Oh... okay.... But.... Won't people find it strange that I'm so big?"

"I can alter reality so that nobody will find it strange that you're a giant!" you explain to him. "And your clothes will grow with your body!"

You take a step back as you watch Ash slowly grow bigger and taller.... His arms and legs grow longer as his torso becomes bigger at the same time. His hands and feet all grow in unison. Within moments, Ash grows from 6 foot 4 inches to 12 feet tall, and his shorts, shoes and t-shirt grow along with him.

"Wow!" he exclaims, as he reaches over and easily grabs the kitten from the tree branch, which is now in his reach.

You now look up to Ash, who is a twelve-foot-tall giant. And he's all smiles...
