1432.content:
Weeks had passed since Your first encounter with the kid you saved during the first day of school, apparently his name was Allen Rasul Collins, and just like you he was a freshman at Sunrise High school. In all of your days of living you have never met anyone more annoying. Allen seemed to appear everywhere you went, demanding that you keep the promise you made to him the first day you two met, a promise that you in fact never intended to keep. You wanted to live a normal life, yes you had omnipotent power but that didn’t mean you had to use them every second of everyday, nor did that mean that you had to tell anyone about them, you did not owe this boy a exclamation, you did not owe him anything. In fact where did he get off demanding anything from you, you a almighty being who could turn that mortal into a worm, or maybe wipe him from the face of the earth with nothing but a thought, this was your power, your authority, so the question that plagued your mind was why didn’t you do exactly that, or at least erase his memory? Could it be that you where starting to actually like that idiotic kid? What ever the answer, you had better things to concern yourself with, today was the day that tryouts where being held for the swim team and you where determined to make the team.

The pool was pretty big, and looked quite impressive, in truth it looked like a professional swimming pool. The pool supported ten lanes that where separated by ten dividers. Their where also ten diving boards that rested at the far end of the pool. You couldn’t help but be impressed. You glance over towards your right, you see a group of around 19 boy sitting down In the stands, all of these boys whore black jackets decorated with yellow stripes, the words Sunshine High Swimming team printed on their backs. You could tell that these boys where your elders, the people who where already on the swimming team. These boys where talking to one another and some of them looked at you with a smug smile on their face. You didn’t have to read their minds to tell what they where thinking, they where simply looking down on you plain and simple. You didn’t mind because in fact you where looking down on them to.

A few minutes passed and a few more students appeared at the pool. Counting you their where 18 students that where trying to join the swimming team. After a few more minutes passed a man who seemed to be in his 30 appeared. This man wore a Hawaiian shirt and brown shorts that had to many pockets in your opinion. It was obvious to all that this man did not know how to be professional, he wore flip flops to work instead of regular shoes so yea you where pretty sure he wasn’t professional at all, but in all truth and honesty this gave the man a more relaxed demeanor, and that wasn’t technically a bad thing in your eyes.

“Attention maggots!!!” The man yelled at the top of his lungs. “(Ok so maybe he wasn’t relaxed after all)” you thought.

“Newbies lined up on my right, and oldies on my left!” The man yelled as he pointed in front of him.

It didn’t take everyone long to get in line, even the students who where already on the swimming team, rushed to get in line. It was impressive how this man inspired obedience and loyalty in his students, even though you yourself was not afraid of this man, you thought it best to do what he says for now.

“My name is Jacob Russell, you will call me Mr. Russell or Coach Russell, do I make myself clear!” Mr. Russell says in another loud shout.

Some of the students shook their head, others replied “ok” softly as if they where mumbling to themselves

“I SAID DO I MAKE MY SELF CLEAR!!!!” Mr. Russell said in a even louder voice.

“““YES COUCH RUSSELL!!!!””” Everyone shouted in a loud voice, even you yourself.

“Today is the beginning of tryouts, your job is simple. Impress me. Failure to do so will result in termination. This termination includes everyone, newbies and oldies. So in short welcome to hell ladies. Mr. Russell said with a evil smirk.

“Oh brother.”

14321.content:
Swim Practice lasted hours and their seemed to be no end in sight. Coach Russell made good on his promise, swim practice was hell for everyone, everyone except you. It was because of your absolute condition, that you could never become tired, it didn’t matter how much exercise you did you would never sweat or feel even a little bit exhausted. Before practice began coach Russell made everyone change Into their swim trunks, while in the boys locker room.

Swim practice began at 3:30 and it was now 4:20. You had to give coach Russell credit, he knew how to turn a short amount of time into a nightmare. Coach Russell made everyone do 50 push-ups, 50 sit ups, and 100 laps in the pool. By the time everyone was done with the exercise from hell they where all dripping wet, on their knees or back gasping for air, therefore you stood out from everyone, because you are the only one on your feet, not looking tired at all, instead you look like you could do another 100 laps.

“Well look at you.” Coach Russell says while walking over to you.

“You boys see this, this is the kind of endurance I expect from all of you!” The coach yells.

The boys on the ground look at you, some with amazement, others with disdain. You didn’t care, it wasn’t your fault that you had the perfect body. While standing around waiting for the coach to give you the next exercise you look over towards the stands and see Allen sitting down watching you practice with a few more students. Allen would not leave you alone, well you would have to deal with him later.

“Ok everyone LINE UP!” The coach yells.

Everyone returns to the lines they where in during the start of practice.

“Tryouts are over for today, and I have to say very little of you have impressed me.” Coach Russell says, crossing his arms.

“Well the results for today’s tryouts will be on the gym door tomorrow. Dismissed. The coach says, walking out of the pool deck and heading for his office which was inside of the boys locker room.

Everyone starts to head towards the boy locker rooms in order to change out of their wet close, everyone expect you. You grab your back back and start to head home.

“Hey. William wait up.” Allen says running besides you.

“Aren’t you going to get changed with everyone else?” Allen asks.

“No need.” You say

You snap your fingers and your wet swim trunks begin to change into black jeans, and your bare chest gets covered by a plane white t shirt.

“Woah now that is cool.” Allen says

Allen and you walk home together. This was the first time you had ever walked home with someone else and it felt strange.

“So are you going to finally keep your promise to me, and tell me what you are?” Allen asks.

Allen was very Adamant about you revealing your secrets, and maybe you should, you made a promise after all, and maybe it was time you kept it.

“Very well.” You said while letting out a little sigh.

You told Allen pretty much everything, like how you were omnipotent, and how your parents knew about your powers and how they were never afraid of you, you also explain how you have had your powers ever since you were 8 years old.

“But how did you get your powers?” Allen asks

You look at Allen, for a few seconds then you revert your gaze towards the ground.

“It all began with a choice.” You say.

“That’s all you need to know. Now look you seem like a good kid but I don’t need any of this.” You say.

You stop walking and look straight at Allen.

“What are you saying?” Allen asks looking a little worried.

“I’m saying that I’m willing to grant you a wish, one wish, but only on one condition.”

You hold up one finger.

“What condition.” Allen asks.

“You have to leave me alone when we are at school, and you must never tell anyone my secret, in return I’ll grant any wish you may have, except omnipotents itself.” You say.

“So you are willing to grant any wish, I have.” Allen asks, with a face filled with surprise.

“Yes, doesn’t matter what it is I’ll give it to you. Like maybe more riches than you will ever be able to spend in your lifetime, or maybe immortality, or to rule over thousands of stars, or the earth itself. Just ask and it will be yours.” You say holding up your right hand.

Whatever wish Allen makes you knew it will only be in his own self entrust, well ether way he will be out of your hair forever.

“Well in that case I wish.....”

143211.content:
“I wish to be super strong!” Allen said to you. “I had always wanted to be stronger than everybody else, you know?”

You looked at him with a smile on your face. That was an easy wish. Easy to accomplish, too. All you had to do was to wish for his muscles to grow to pro bodybuilder proportions and for him to have superhuman physical strength. That’s all there was to it. Oh, and you wished for all his clothes in his wardrobe to adjust to his new proportions.

Just like that, Allen’s chest started to expand in every direction while his arms inflated with muscle. His triceps and biceps literally doubled the size of his muscles in no time. His flat chest exploded with large orbs of pectorals while his flat stomach now sported the most well-defined abdominal muscles on the planet. His entire torso grew a foot wider by the shoulders. Throughout all this, Allen let out a soft groan while his muscles were growing rapidly.

“Uhhhhhhh!” he moaned while he had his eyes closed.

You looked on happily as you continued to monitor the kid’s fantastic muscular growth. Allen’s quadriceps inflated to the size of Redwood Oak trees, showing mighty columns of thick muscle which ran from his waist down to his knees while they were completely covered in long, thick, rope-like veins. Lastly, his thin calves on the back of his legs grew like bread in the oven, inflating to the size of large soccer balls, fully covered with a network of veins as well. As soon as the growth spurt stopped, his clothes adjusted to cover his larger muscles. His shorts and his t-shirt grew, so he looked like a big, teenage kid with big, bulging muscles.

“Ohmygosh!” Allen exclaimed as soon as the growth spurt ended. He looked down, flexing his huge arms and legs. He felt an increased strength coursing through his body. He was strong enough to lift a car with his bare hands. “William! This is incredible!”

“There! You got your wish, big guy!” you smile as you started to turn around so you could continue your walk towards your house, which was just one block away.

“Uhh…. William? Please?” Allen said as he easily passed you by. That was easy for him now, thanks to his big, pumped-up legs. “Umm… Can I still hang out with you after school? I mean… We’re not at school anymore…”

You stopped and you looked at the big muscle guy. It’s now hard not to like this guy. He really wanted to be your friend. You realize, thanks to your omniscience, that he really doesn’t have a lot of friends, either. Of course, that will now change because he’s the big muscle man at school. But for now, he wanted your friendship. You figure his popularity would soar starting the following day and he would eventually gain so many friends that he would forget about you anyway. But for now, he was your only friend.

“Sure, big guy! Come on, my place is over here!” you say to him as you point at your house.

The muscle man follows you and you let him in. You introduce him to your parents and then you take him to your bedroom. There, you sit down at the edge of your bed and you pull out the game console. The two of you play a round of Fortnite, which Allen easily wins.

Afterwards, you two grab some ice cream out of the freezer and you scoop up two cups with some delicious chocolate ice cream. You sit down on the patio overlooking the backyard pool.

“Listen, Allen… I’m sorry for sounding so harsh earlier. But, you gotta understand that I don’t want everyone at school to know about my powers, okay?” you say to him.

“Oh, okay… I understand… I just want to be your friend, that’s all, William…” he says with a sad look on his face.

“As far as everyone is concerned, you just have really good genetics and you lift weights in the gym every single day! Because of that, you’re such a strong, young guy! You got that?” you tell him sternly. “I want you to forget about me ever having mentioned anything about my Godly powers and you’ll forget about me making your muscles grow. You became big by going to the gym. You did that on your own!”

You look on as Allen blinks for a moment.

“Man, that ice cream was delicious. Now, I gotta hit the gym and work off all those extra calories!” he smiles as he finishes his cup of ice cream.

Just then, your mom comes out through the kitchen door.

“Oh, William? I got some boxes with books which I need to deliver to the library. They’re really heavy. Can you carry them to the car for me?” she says to you. “Thanks, sweetheart!”

“Mind giving us a hand, big guy?” you say to Allen.

“Oh, I don’t mind that at all!” Allen chuckles as he stands up and flexes both arms, causing his huge biceps to swell up on his arms. “Time to put these babies to work!”

It was an incredible sight. Allen walked over to the back corner of your mother’s bedroom, where she had two large boxes filled with books stacked on top of each other. He just squatted down, lifting both boxes like they weighed nothing at all. Then, he turned around, easily carrying those boxes filled with old books, weighing over a hundred pounds, to the garage where he placed them in the trunk of your mother’s car. It was the easiest task in the world for the big muscle kid.

“All done, William!” Allen smiled, as he rested his big arm over your shoulders. “That was easy!”

“Thanks, dude! Well, I got some studying to do! I guess I’ll catch you at school tomorrow?”

“Yeah! I’m going to the gym!” Allen said, as he hugged you briefly before walking off. “See yah tomorrow, bro!”

“See ya, big man!” you grin as you watch him walk towards the gym. You were happy with the way that turned out. You still made a friend and your secret was still safe, after all. You just hoped that Allen wouldn’t get into any trouble at school the next day. You wondered if you had made him too strong? Or, maybe you should have buffed up some other kid as well, just to be friends with him and to help him stay out of trouble?

143212.content:
“I wish to be your friend.” Allen says with a smilie on his face and raising his right hand for a hand shake

You stood confused, surprised. This was not the first time, you had made this offer to a mortal. You had to have heard wrong, but deep you knew you hadn’t. But you had to be sure.

“Come again?” You ask.

“I wish to be your friend.” Allen asks again.

This couldn’t be happening, you wanted to get rid of this mortal, now, now you just might be stuck with him.

“What?!” You yell.

The sky begins to darken, and the wind starts to blow with great ferocity, all of this came from your anger, your wrath.

“You, you would waste a wish on something so trivial!” You yell, thunder echos throughout the darken sky.

Allen was a little scared but for some reason he stood his ground.

“I REFUSE TO HAVE ANY RELATIONS WITH SOMEONE LIKE YOU.” Your voice makes the ground rumble, and makes lightning from the heavens fall, yet still Allen stood his ground, the question was why.

“YOUR WISH, YOUR WISH, is granted.” You say, your voice turning back to normal.

You closed your eyes trying to wake up from this stupid dream. But it wasn’t a dream, it was reality. You look at Allen who in turn looks at you with that same gentle smile that made it hard for you to hate him.

“Are you sure Allen, are you sure that you want to use your one and only wish, so that we can have a true friendship?” You ask, waiting for Allen to jump and yell “ got ya!”

“Yes I’m sure William.” Allen says holding up his right hand once again for a handshake.

You rub your head with your right hand. Your head seemed to almost hurt from all of this ridiculousness, which wasn’t possible because of your powers.

“Very well.” You said shaking Allen’s hand.

“Thanks William.” Allen says with a little laugh.

“You can call me Will, seeing as to how we are friends now.” You say with a little attitude.

You didn’t want this, you could have easily backed out of the deal, but you knew you couldn’t. Lying to people just wasn’t your style, you considered it beneath you to not tell the truth.

“I got to say Allen you are one strange mortal.” You say with a little smirk, as you look at Allen.

“How am I strange?” Allen asks.

“You are not the first person I have offered a wish to, everyone else had always used their wish for their own selfish gain, but you used your wish to become my friend, honestly I don’t know if your just pure hearted, or just a idiot.” You say still feeling a little bit annoyed.

“Well I know I made the right choice, so I have no regrets.” Allen says crossing his arms.

“Hey why didn’t you run away earlier?” You ask.

“What do you mean?” Allen asks looking at you confused.

“I mean when the sky turned black and was filled with thunder and lightning, and my very voice made a earthquake.” You say trying to jog Allen’s memory.

“Oh, well I don’t really know, I guess I fooled my instincts.” Allen says.

“Instincts?” You ask confused.

“Yea, I remembered how you said you wanted to live a normal life, so I figured that someone who seeks to live a normal life would reframe from kill someone. Plus you seem like a kind person.” Allen asks.

You stare at Allen for a few minutes, a little surprised. This kid didn't look like it but he was very smart.

“I’ve met many people in my life, but you Allen are truly one of a kind.” You say walking down the sidewalk with Allen right behind you.

“Honestly I can only think of one other person that was much like you.” You say looking down at the ground, with a sad eyes, and a gloomy smile.

“Who?” Allen asks curious.

You go silent thinking of things that have already passed.

(Flashback)

Smoke filled the sky , and burning ash consumed the air. Fields that were once filled with lush crops were set ablaze with a unforgiving fire. Amongst the burning fields lay a teenage girl, gravely injured, and in great pain, you sat next to her clutching her tightly as if you were afraid that she would slip out of your grasp forever. Tears fell from your eyes, tears that you had thought dried up a long time ago.

“Please, please let me save you. You can’t expect me to let you die, not like this.” You say in a grieving voice.

“William, you have to let me go, if you love me then please, let me go. The girl said breathing hard, with tears in her eyes.

You and the girl go silent for a little while, staring into each other’s eyes.

“Please, please do not lose faith in humanity, with these hands you can reach them, I know you can.” The girl says in a quite voice, before she turns silent forever more.

“Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

A painful scream is carried by the wind, and lighting lights up the night sky, all of this was evidence, evidence to reveal that even gods cry.

“Ashley I’m sorry.”

(End of flashback)

“Hey Will are you ok.” Allen says shaking your shoulder.

You snap out of your daydreaming and look at Allen.

“Yea I’m alright, I was just thinking of the past.” You say looking a little sad

It was Saturday morning, and you with great ease started to get up from bed. You in truth didn’t need to sleep, breath, eat, or even go to the bathroom, but you where so use to it, you honestly didn’t feel like changing your whole system. The suns rays shines through your window curtains, lighting up your room. You standing on your own two feet, slowly walk towards your dresser, which stood by the wall closet to your closet door. You open drawer after drawer and soon bring out a white shirt with a picture of a eagle on the back of it, blue jean pants, and two pairs of white socks. You throw the close onto the bed, and with a snap of your fingers your whole body starts to glow with heavenly light. As the light subsides, the close that where once on the bed, are now on you.

“Well I better begin my day.” You say.

In truth you where not looking forward to this day. You had Swim practice later in the afternoon at 3:30, plus Allen wanted to spend some time with you as well. Allen in your eyes was truly a mystery, but you felt like you could handle that mystery, as long as nothing else happened.

“Knock, knock, knock.” You hear three knocks at the door.

“Flash”, you for a small second where covered in a blinding light as you stood in your room, as soon as the light had vanished and you had disappeared from your room, and had teleported right in front of the door.

You didn’t ever really answer the door, that kind of thing, you left to your mother, or some other person, but this time was different. You had a bad feeling about this mysterious guest.

You slowly open the door to see a very beautiful women with light brown hair and brown eyes. The women wore a black leather jacket with a grey shirt underneath it, she had on tight grey jeans and black boots on her feet that went way past her ankles. The women wore a smile as she looked at you.

“Well if it isn’t William King.” The women says with a seductive smile.

“To think that I would run into the God child all the way out here.”

“Clara Jean.” You stayed feeling a little irritated 😤.

You had a lot of problems right now, now wasn’t the time to deal with another.

“What do you want Clara?” You say with a evil look on your face.

“Oh come on, is that anyway to talk to your friend?” The women asks with a smug smile on her face.

“You are not my friend, and you now the reason why.” You say getting more and more irritated by the second,

“Oh come on, you are still hung up on that, please it happened so long ago, talk about holding a grudge.” The women say.

“Be quite and tell me why are you here in this town, and don’t play dumb on me.” You say

“Well if you must know.” Clara says walking towards you in a seductive manner. Clara brings her face as close to your face as it could go. Clara’s face was so close that Will could feel her breath.

“IM HERE TO SPEND SOME QUALITY TIME WITH YOU. Clara says.

You knew she was kidding, you and Clara go way back, and if their was something that You knew about Clara, it was when she was lying or hiding something. You believed it to be both.

“Stop playing me.” You say with a little growl.

“Will?”

You look behind Clara to see where that voice was coming from. You see Allen standing a few away from your apartment. Allen had his mouth wide open, and his eyes where in complete shock.

“Will what’s happening.” Allen asks.

This is great, just great. You had to deal with Clara, but know things had just gotten harder.

“Who’s she,” Allen says looking at Clara, his face turning a little red.

You couldn't blame Allen for being so weak in the knees when it came to Clara’s good looks. To gods and men she was truly was as pretty as a diamonds.

“Allen this is my friend Clara, or as, many people call her, the girl with all the looks.

Allen was pretty shocked, he never expected you to act this way, he was even more shocked with Clara, who was wearing a excited smile on her face, as the brick wall around her seemed to be breaking. Allen knew that any normal person would be dead from the amount of force you where using, so how was Clara perfectly fine, with no scratches on her body.

Clara looks at you, her smile completely disappearing.

“I don’t believe you, leave now.” You demanded, pressing Clara further into the brick wall.

Clara looks you dead in the eye 👁 with anger, but soon that look of anger turns into a smug smile.

“Or what?” Clara says with a laugh as she pushes you away with so much force that you go flying across the neighborhood street, and into the other brick wall that stood on the other side of the road, completely destroying it on impact, and barring you under a lot of rubble

Allen couldn’t believe his eyes, this women who ever she was couldn’t be human. You where the most powerful person Allen knew, could their be someone just as strong? Allen wondered how no one noticed these two powerful being, but he soon got his answer as he looked around his surroundings. Every thing, every person had stopped moving. Time Was frozen.

Clara with a smile on her face walks towards the now destroyed wall.

“Come on Will, don’t tell me you’ve lost your very special touch, I see you still care for these humans.” Clara says, like she wasn’t one her self.

The blue sky begins to darken as black clouds appear from nothing. The ground it self begins to rumble with a lot of power, it was as if the world was about to break apart. Lightning starts to pierce the darkened clouds, alerting everyone who saw it, that this fight was just beginning.

“BOOM!” You burst out of the rubble with a great shout as lightning surrounds your body.

You look towards Clara, your eyes glowing dangerously white.

You with great speed appear in front of Clara, who in turn was not shocked by your actions or surprised by your inhuman speed.

“Oh flash step, it’s been awhile since I saw that.” Clara says her smile growing larger.

You throw a punch 🤜 at Clara, your fist completely shattering the sound barrier, creating a sonic boom that threatened to tear apart anything it touched. Clara expecting your attack throws a punch 🤛 as well with the same amount of force.

“BOOM!!!!” The air rages with fury, as a shock wave of unimaginable power spreads throughout the neighborhood, shattering windows and cracking the pure stone pavement. Even more Dust and small pieces of stone flew through the air, clouding peoples vision. Allen was completely blown away from the collision of the two powerful forces generated by both Will and Clara.

As the dust began to disappear Allen began to be able to see the result of the short battle. You and Clara where standing in the middle of a large crater that covered up most of the road. Both of your fists where connected, but. Something caught Allen’s eye. Clara’s fist was changed, transformed. Her right hand was covered in fur, and the right side of her jacket was completely destroyed. Clara smiled as she looked you right in the eyes. You no longer radiated that lightning aura, and your eyes where back to normal .

“So I guess you still haven’t lost your touch.” Clara says with a small laugh.

You look at Clara with eyes as sharp as knives, if this confrontation was going to result in a battle then so be it. You brought Your left fist 👊 up, ready to make your next attack, Clara was doing the same thing, you could tell she wanted this battle, well she was about to get her Wish.

Both you and Clara turn and look at Allen, who with sheer courage places himself in between you and Clara, stoping the coming battle in its tracks. You slowly drop your fist, and in so doing, Clara follows suit. You both stair into each other’s eyes, your will to battle still flaring like a wild fire 🔥. You look at Clara’s right hand, still transformed, covered in black fur, her right eye glowing bright red, her left completely normal.

Upon hearing your response Clara smiles with glee, this was all a game to her, and you hated it.

“So good of you to notice darling.” Clara says with a girly voice.

You glare at her, and she glares at you with that devilish grin, daring you to attack her once again.

“Can someone please explain what’s going on please!” Allen yells towards the heavens. Once again both you and Clara stare at Will with a little confusion.

“So, who’s the kid?” Clara asks pointing at Allen with her right hand, which had already transformed back to normal, the right side of her jacket was still destroyed though. Clara wore a bored expression as she stared at Allen like he wasn’t worth her time.

“This is Allen. He’s a friend.” You say, feeling a little more calm, but still on guard.

“Oh. A friend huh?” Clara says looking at Allen, with a little disbelief.

“More like your new Boy toy.” Clara says walking up to Allen, completely towering over him with that same devilish smile.

Clara stood 5ft 3ins tall, while Allen was 5ft 4ins tall, so Clara was easily bigger than him. Height didn’t matter to you, you being able to change your height as easily as a person changing their clothes, but you were naturally 6ft 4ins tall so Clara couldn’t intimidate you, to bad you could say the same for Allen.

Clara stood in front of Allen glaring down at him with her brown eyes, still wearing a grin on her face. You could tell that Allen was feeling a little uncomfortable. It was as if Clara was a predator, and Allen was her prey.

“This one doesn’t look like much, honestly we’re do you find these weaklings?” Clara asks with nothing but a loud laugh, as she looks back at you with mocking eyes.

You look at Clara and soon your gaze shifts towards Allen, who was sweeting profusely, with your enhanced vision you could even see Allen shaking from the cold hand of fear. You had seen it a dozen times. You had caused it a dozen times. The look of absolute fear, that only a truly powerful being could instill in those weaker. Allen couldn’t move, he couldn't speak, and he could hardly breath, all of this caused by nothing but Clara’s overwhelming presences, a presence so strong, that even those who did not belong to the world of the supernatural could feel, and knew by instinct to fear.

“Well any friend of Will is a friend of mine.” Clara says with a friendly smile, a smile designed to bring
comfort to unsuspecting people, but You knew that, that smile was nothing but a False sense of security.

“That enough, leave the boy alone.” You say threateningly as you glare at Clara.

You walk in between Allen and Clara, hiding Allen behind you as if he were some frightened child, which he was.

“Look Clara if you will not tell me the reason you are really here than so be it, but while you are in this town you will not cause any trouble.” You demand as you look at Clara.

Clara continues to stare at Allen who was now hiding behind you with a wide smile. You did not like that. Clara soon shifts her gaze back to you a her smile growing even wider until you could see her teeth.

“Where’s the fun in that?” Clara asks playfully.

Thunder echoes through the sky, making it evident to all that you didn’t like that answer.

“You will not cause any trouble.” You say once again with a dark tone.

Clara’s smile soon disappears as she stares at seriously 😒.

“Fine I won’t cause any trouble... way to ruin a girls good time.” Clara says turning away from your dark gaze, and soon faster than the human eye could track vanishes without a trace.

Clara in your eyes was many things, but she wasn’t a fool. Deep down she knew who was really superior when it came to power. She knew that you could wipe her off the face of the earth with nothing but a thought. She would not defy you, at least that is what you thought.

You turn around and look at Allen, who was finally back to his old self. Allen stares at you with a face that told you Allen’s mind was filled with unanswered questions.

“Will I got to ask one question? Who the hell was that? Why are you so angry with her? Why did her arm transform? Why where you to fighting in the first place? How the hell did she send you of all people flying into a brick wall, and where the hell did she just go?!” Allen asks.

“That’s more than one question dude.” You say a little confused.

Allen looks at you curious as to what the question could be about.

“Oh about a thousand years ago give or take a few centuries.” You say, as if it was completely normal.

Allen couldn’t believe what he had heard, how could anyone live that long.

“Wait, so are you telling me you time traveled?” Allen asks with wide opened eyes.

You laugh seeing Allen’s expression.

“Back in the old days I would travel all throughout the time stream, looking for something to do.” You say your smile becoming even bigger.

Allen thinks back to the battle between Will and Clara. Will had stopped time all around the neighborhood, after the battle Will then reset time back to the way it was, and he did it so easily.

“Clara at the time was also 9 years old as well.” You continued your story.

“When I met her, she was on the run.” You say with a series tone.

“On the run? From who?” Allen asks.

“Clara belonged to the Arnulf Clan.” You say

“She was actually the daughter of the head chief.” You explain.

“The Alnulf Clan had many enemies, and Clara was constantly a target of the other rival tribes and clans.” You say.

“When I first met her she was running from one of those clans.” You say.

You go quite for a few minutes thinking about the past.

“I saved her.... and with a great amount of pity granted her a wish.”

You and Allen walk throughout the park.

You stop walking as a powerful shudder runs up your spine.

“Because..... she did something unforgivable.” You say in a threatening tone.

You look into Allen’s face, your whole body radiating anger.

“Just drop it.” You say in a low but threatening voice, before you walk away.

“Sorry Allen I got practice to get to, see you later.” You say as you walk away.

Allen watch’s as you walk down the sidewalk. Sweat was falling down his face as he watched you disappear into the crowd of people walking down the sidewalk. Allen knew deep down that he had dogged a bullet, but Allen still couldn’t help but wonder what did Clara do which was so unforgivable.

“Hello boy.”

Allen turns around upon hearing a familiar voice. Standing right behind him was Clara herself, smiling a mischievous smile.

“Oh no.”

144.content:
Amanda Brown. At least, that's what you called yourself for now. If you ever tired of it you could just change it.

You knew how it had happened. At the moment your father's sperm entered your mother's ovum, a stray cosmic ray had altered something, and you'd been aware of your own existence. Almost immediately after you'd been aware that, in fact, it wasn't just your existence of which you were aware, but rather everything. From the moment of your conception you'd been omnipotent.

You knew, for instance, that the cosmic ray had been no accident. You'd created yourself; in fact, you'd created the universe. And you were aware of other universes, infinitely many, all of which you'd created and could manipulate in any way with a mere thought.

Even as a clump of cells that had existed for only a few seconds it had been laughably easy to reach back in time and make sure the cosmic ray intersected your initial genetic material at the precise moment. You'd never found anything else to be any harder--which is to say, everything you'd ever done had been utterly, completely effortless.

Growing up you had never let anyone know about your abilities. Well, you had, but you had always erased their memories and reversed the changes, or changed the reality everyone else perceived to make it so that the change you had made was normal. For instance, when you were eight, you'd changed the classroom bully into a girl so that he could see what it was like, but the new girl was a genuinely better person, and so as far as everyone else knew, Karl Young had always been Carla Young.

You'd also read and watched as much science fiction and fantasy as you could get your hands on. You enjoyed the stories, but even more you enjoyed simply appearing in them and messing around however you wanted. It was amazing how the appearance of a truly omnipotent being could change a story. Even in stories that had omnipotent beings you were still more powerful, of course.

Today was special, though. Today was the first day of your last year of high school. You'd decided to go through school like a normal human child, though you didn't care to limit yourself. If there was one thing you loved about omnipotence more than other things, it was the omnipresence. As Amanda Brown you were a nerd, but you were also enrolled under various other names and were always in multiple bodies, or rather physically manifesting yourself in multiple forms in multiple places. You'd been on every school sports team since you got there, and on the cheerleading team. In that whole time the school had never lost an athletic competition. They'd never even come close to losing. Even the cheerleading team had won every competition it entered. Those other bodies were children of other parents, but they were all manifestations of you.

But as Amanda you were the school's academic star. And as Amanda, you had only two friends: Karen Carter and Ashley Durham.

Karen and Ashley were nerds, same as you, and were it not for you, would have been the school's best students. You had taken them on some wild adventures before, but never allowed them to remember. Today you would reveal your omnipotence to them, and they would remember.

The three of you had lockers near each other, and when you were all there, chatting, you nonchalantly froze time.

"Whoa," said Karen. "What just happened?"

"It's like they're frozen somehow," said Ashley. "This... this is incredible."

"Not so incredible when you're dealing with an omnipotent being," you said.

"Wait, what?" said Ashley.

"I'm omnipotent. Always have been, always will be."

"How come you never told us this before?" asked Karen.

"Oh, I have. But I also knew that you weren't ready to remember it. Now you are. There's really only one rule: you can't tell anyone else. But there's no need to remember the rule. You literally can't tell anyone else."

"How do you mean, we can't?"

"You can't. You're physically incapable of it."

"You changed us to do this? You just used your powers on us without even asking?"

"Oh, come on. I just don't want people knowing my secret unless I want them to know. And I knew that if I hadn't done this, you would--eventually--have blabbed. It's just too big for anyone to sit on."

"I guess you're right," said Karen, "but you should have trusted us. I mean, if we had told, you could have just changed things so that we hadn't, right?"

"Yeah, I could have, but I chose to forestall it. Anyway, you've got an omnipotent being as a friend, and for myself, I just want to have fun with my friends."

"What sort of fun are we talking here, Amanda?" asked Ashley.

"Any fun you want. It's not like anything I do is permanent. If we screw up somehow I can always change it back. Or we could deliberately mess things up."

"What do you mean by 'deliberately mess things up'?" asked Karen.

"Ever wondered what a galaxy tastes like?"

"No, not really, but now that you mention it..." Karen trailed off. You knew she had a secret dream of being a dominant giantess but that she'd never thought of being that big.

"Personally I'd want to pull pranks on people, you know, make them nude at embarrassing moments, change their bodies in grotesque ways, stuff like that," said Ashley.

"We can do that and so much more," you said. "But I think the first thing we should do is have bodies that reflect our new status--I've only had this one since society expects that beautiful girls wouldn't be nerds like us. But now I'm going to make myself smoking hot, and I'm willing to do the same for you. I could even give you a number of different forms and let you switch between them as you want."

Karen and Ashley looked at each other, shrugged, smiled, and started talking over each other.

Of course, you knew exactly what your friends were saying, but you knew they'd want to see what each other wanted and see the changes as they happened.

"Karen, Ashley, please," you said. "One at a time. Karen?"

"So you said we could have multiple forms if we wanted?"

"Of course. Anything for the best friends an omnipotent goddess could want--well, except omnipotence yourselves. There are a few limits on my power--not many--and that's one."

"Could you maybe create a simulacrum of me? Just so we can all see the changes."

"Sure," and a naked Karen popped into existence nearby.

"Okay, well, I think you both know that I've dreamed of being a huge giantess, so I want to be able to make myself grow."

"How big?" you asked.

"Ten miles? Is that too big?"

"It's a good starting point. All right, here's you at ten miles. You'll also be able to go anywhere in between." A city stretched out beneath the simulacrum. Karen's feet covered some of it and you could see the earliest signs of sexual arousal in your friend.

"I also want to be able to enlarge my breasts and butt so that I can crush things with them." In turn you enlarged the breasts and butt of the simulacrum until Karen indicated that she was satisfied with their maximum size.

"Those are your maximums, but they'll scale with you proportionally."

"And I'd like my hair to be able to reach the ground if I want, so I can swing it into buildings. Oh, and I want to be able to lengthen my tongue and lick up people from the ground." You applied the changes.

"And what do you want as your normal form? This one at least has to be reasonably sized, but you can still have big proportions if you want."

"Hm," said Karen. "Maybe 7'6", breasts out to here"--she gestured a fair distance from her chest--"and a butt to match, hair brushing its top?"

The simulacrum changed to show this form for Karen, and she smiled in satisfaction. You turned to Ashley and prompted her to begin, creating a simulacrum of her.

"Well, I've got this multiple limbs fetish, and so I was hoping it wasn't too weird for you..."

"Nah. To be honest I've had lots of fun giving myself an extra pair of arms sometimes, really helps out in certain situations."

"Okay, so I want to be able to give myself extra arms, maybe ten pairs"--the simulacrum changed to show the extras--"and more breasts, enough for the arms, and more legs, maybe eight, four in front, four in back? Oh, and two extra heads. I know a lot of people wouldn't like this but I just always have."

The simulacrum showed Ashley with all the changes she'd wanted. "Okay," you said, "like Karen, you can go anywhere in between. Also, both of you will get clothing to suit when you change. What body do you want for your usual form, Ashley?"

"Well, I have this other thing..." You knew, of course, where she was going, but let her continue. "I just really like seeing people who are completely identical, at least to my eye. I was kinda hoping you two would be willing to have us look like identical triplets normally, except I guess for the clothes, make-up, hairdo, jewelry... But our bodies should be the same."

You were indifferent on the matter--it's not like anything you did was irreversible--but looked at Karen. "What the hell," she said. "It'll be fun."

The three of you morphed into tall, busty women. You decided that the three of you should have purple hair, something more to set you apart from everyone else. Of course, to everyone else, it was completely normal.

"Also, Ashley, when Karen makes herself into a giantess, you're completely immune from anything she does."

"So I'm immortal?"

"No, not until I'm sure you can handle immortality. And if you start doing really foolish things like throwing yourself off cliffs with no safety precautions... well, sorry, but I'm not making promises to bring you back to life in that case. Doesn't mean I won't, though, but don't count on it. And Karen, you can rampage as much as you want, but I'm probably not going to let it stick. And they certainly won't remember it, at least not after I fix it. Still, I might let it stay for a while. And I promise you'll remember it."

You changed reality so that nobody would question how three nerd girls were instantaneously replaced by what appeared to be insanely sexy identical triplets--for now you all even had the same clothing, accessories and hairdos--and unfroze time.

14413.content:
Since you were all in the school's highest academic stream, your class schedules were identical, though of course you could change those schedules whenever you wanted. With Karen and Ashley you headed toward your first class, history.

"Oh," you said, "I should note that we can talk telepathically now." You switched to your telepathic voice. "Like this."

"This is cool," said Karen telepathically.

"Very cool," agreed Ashley.

The curriculum began where it had left off last year, at the start of World War I.

As the teacher droned on about life in the trenches, Karen piped up silently. "Hey, Amanda, wouldn't this be more fun if we were actually experiencing it?"

Ashley added, "Yeah, it would really add something to the lesson."

"I question your ideas of 'fun,' but sure." With a thought your entire class, and the teacher, were a platoon manning a trench in World War I.

"Whoa," said Karen. "Why are we in these bodies?"

"They didn't put women on the front lines, Karen," said Ashley. "But this is pretty interesting."

From a distance you heard machine-gun fire. You ran toward one of the emplacements in the trench and, when the noise stopped, returned fire. Karen and Ashley looked at you, a bit surprised.

"Well? You wanted to be here!"

They realized that they were in a World War I trench for real, and ran to man other emplacements.

After some time you returned the class to their original time, which sadly included bringing a few of them back from the dead.

"So," asked Karen, "will they remember?"

"No," you replied, "but they will have a better understanding of life in the trenches than almost anyone else alive."

The rest of the class was pretty boring, but you had fun watching as the rest of the class was utterly oblivious to all the changes you made to the teacher. He ranged from being two feet to eight feet tall, wimp to musclebound, fresh out of college to near retirement, and as a woman he went from flat-chested nerd girl to stunning model. You restored him to his original body at the end of class, of course.

"So," you asked, "what class do you want next?"

1513.title: god child is your bestfriend

choices: Andy decided to make something really cool happen
Andy wanted to keep his Godly powers a secret a little longer
15131.content:
You hop on the skateboard and you push off with your right foot, setting the board into motion. Luckily, you really don’t have that far to go… Only three blocks. You’ve known Andy for over eight years now, ever since you entered kindergarten. So here you are, at the beginning of the new school year and it’s a Saturday morning. You get up and skate over to his house to see what he’s doing. He’s usually awake by now, but you always end up giving him a call just to be nice.

When you’re only a block away you stop and hop off the board. You take your iPhone out of your pocket and you dial his number.

“Yo!”

“Hey, Eric…” you hear a sleepy voice reply over the phone.

“Still in bed, Andy? Dang, dude! I’m a block away from your house!”

“Well… Uhh… Come over, dude… We’ll skate around my street when you get here…” he explains. “I just woke up in the middle of the night with a weird dream, that’s all…”

“You’re up late watching horror movies, dude! It’s your own fault!” you say to him. “Okay, get dressed! I’ll be there in two minutes!”

You let out a deep sigh. But, you still like the guy like a brother. He’s your best and only friend. You’re a geek and a nerd and so is he, a little bit. Since you’re both in middle school and enjoying life in the seventh grade, you help each other out all the time. You fight off thugs and bullies in school and you cheer each other on. You know one another’s darkest secrets and you know all the likes and dislikes. Andy is the closest thing you got to having a real brother. You’re both thirteen years old and you even have birthdays during the same month, only days apart!

When you finally reach the front door to his house, you hop off the board and tap the end so it flies up in the air, just high enough for you to grab the end with your hand. You turn the cap on your head back before you knock three times on the door. Andy’s mother opens up and lets you in. She tells you that he had just gotten up and that he was just getting out of the shower. So, you walk into his bedroom where you expect to see his bed still a mess.

You’re very surprised to see his sheets and blanket neatly made up and folded right by the end where the pillows are at the end of the bed. His shoes are polished and his laundry is clean and put away. All his school books are put away in the bookcase and his comic books are stored in his closet. His room actually looks very tidy!

“Hey, Eric!” Andy said, as he walked out of the bathroom.

Andy was actually an inch shorter than you, with long light-brown hair and blue eyes. His hair was long and straight and it ran past his ears, covering them completely. He still wore braces, which would show every time Andy smiled, which was often. Andy was slender but average, like a skater. You waited patiently as he got his shorts, socks and t-shirt out of his dresser and got dressed.

“Man! What took you so long? You knew I was coming! I come over every Saturday morning, dude!” you grumble.

“Eric… I fell asleep, dude! I work up like around five o’clock or something after I had this really strange dream… I don’t even remember all of it…” Andy explained to you as he put on his shirt.

“I bet you were being chased by zombies again, huh?” you laugh out loud.

“Actually… Not at all! I was in deep space… I met this beautiful woman… I think she was some kind of an angel or something… And she started talking to me about God…” Andy started telling you.

“Ohhh… Come on, dude! Don’t tell me you’re sick and you’re dying of some horrible disease, right?” you sigh.

“No, no…” Andy smiles at you. “Nothing like that! Nothing at all!”

Andy sat down at the edge of his bed as he put on his tennis shoes.

“It was something about some mighty entity looking to pass on Godly powers to me… And that I was going to be God from this point forward…” he said as he tied his laces.

“Yeah… Well I don’t see a halo above your head or wings behind your back, dude!” you laugh. “You’ve been spending too much time in church! Now, hurry up!”

“There! I’m done!” Andy said, as he jumped up from the bed and grabbed his board. “Let’s go!”

You follow behind him, carrying your board as well. You walk outside as both of you hop on your boards as you skate down the sidewalk. After a slow, quiet minute of riding down the sidewalk of your street, you pass the ice cream truck! Suddenly, you become really thirsty!

“Andy! Hey, Andy!”

“Yo!”

“I have a few quarters! Do you have any money?” you ask him.

“Yeah, I got a Dollar!” Andy says.

You hop off the board and walk up to the counter which is along the side of the truck, where the man is serving his customers.

“What will it be, you guys? The man asks you.

“Can I have a scoop of chocolate on a cone?” you ask him.

“Give me a scoop of vanilla on a cone, please!” Andy says, handing him a Dollar bill.

After a few moments, the man hands Andy his ice cream cone.

“I’m sorry, son… I think I ran out of chocolate…” the man said to you.

“Uhh… Are you sure you checked your freezer all the way?” Andy said to him.

“Well… I’ll check again, just to make you guys happy!” the man replied. “But, I’m pretty sure of it!”

The man turned around and raised the lid on the large freezer in the back corner. He rummaged around, moving small packages containing ice cream around, lifting and moving packages so he can reach all the way to the bottom of the freezer.

“No… I don’t see a single pack of chocolate… OH! Wait a minute… Goodness!” the man shouted. “Ohmygosh! You are sooooooo lucky!!!”

The man turned around, holding a pack of chocolate ice cream in his hands.

“Look what I found! The last one! Buried under all the other ones!” he smiled as he pulled the lid off and started scooping up some ice cream on a cone for you.

“There! That will be one Dollar!”

You reach down in your pocket and pull out three dimes and two nickels and two pennies…

“Ohhh crap…” you groan, “Don’t tell me I don’t have enough money to buy a stupid ice cream cone!”

“Uhhh… Check your other pocket…” Andy suggested to you.

“I never carry change in my left pocket, just in my right pocket!” you explain. “I’m right-handed!”

“Well… Look anyway!”

You grudgingly shove your hand into your left pocket, not expecting to find anything, when you feel something hard! Several hard things! You pull them out and realize you had two additional quarters in your hand!

“There! I got it!” you cheer, counting a Dollar in change on the counter.

The ice cream vendor happily hands you the ice cream cone as you and Andy turn around and walk off, both of you carrying your boards in one hand and your ice cream cones in the other hands.

“Dude… It must be my lucky day because I was sweating it for a brief moment…” you quietly say to Andy. “First, it seemed like he didn’t have the ice cream I wanted, and then it almost seemed like I didn’t have enough money to pay for the ice cream in the first place! After all that! What a lucky break!”

Andy just stared at you with a wide grin on his face, without saying a word.

“Yup… Today’s your lucky day, Eric…”

You just smirk as you look back at him.

“I still think that dream you had this morning was totally weird… I mean… If you really were God then you could make really cool things happen, right?” you chuckle.

Andy just shrugged.

“I guess so!”

Then…

choices: Alex makes Eric grow more muscular
Alex makes Eric even bigger or taller

Alex and Eric meet a girl next door
151311.content:
“So, Eric, where do you want to go now?” Andy asked you as you licked your ice cream cone.

“Well, the park is right down the street and only a block away! Wanna go over there? The weather seems nice so far… Even though it’s starting to get kinda cloudy!” you respond, looking up to the cloudy sky.

“Oh yes… We’ll be fine. It’s not going to rain at the park. Don’t worry! Follow me!” Andy says confidently as he starts to skate straight towards the park.

“Uhh…. Listen here, Mister Weatherman! How do you know for sure that it’s not gonna rain?” you grin as you skate next to him.

“Just look! It’s clearing up right now! We won’t get any rain at the park! Trust me!”

As soon as you look up you see the dark clouds blowing over, the minute Andy said that. Pretty weird!

So, you skate over to the park and you hop off the skateboards as soon as you reach the grassy area. You walk over to the lake where the ducks swim and you hear a commotion off to the distance. You walk over to a small crowd forming by a tall tree where a cat got stuck on one of the branches, too scared to jump down.

“Here, kitty! Aww…. Poor kitty is too scared to jump!” someone stated.

“Someone needs to climb that tree and grab that kitty!”

“Any tall guys around?”

The branch that the cat was on was almost 14 feet above the ground. Nobody over 6 feet tall was standing among the crowd.

You and Alex walk up to the crowd. You feel sorry for the cat and you look at Alex, who was watching you the whole time.

“You really want to get the cat down from there, huh?” he says quietly.

“Yeah.”

“But, you’re too short…”

“Yeah… Darn it!”

“Being a giant is one of your secret fantasies, right?” he whispers.

“Yeah… Wait… How did you know?”

“To be a big, tall, muscle guy, right, Eric?” he adds.

“Y-y-yeah… I-I can’t remember ever telling you that…”

“You don’t have to tell me anything, Eric.” Alex says. “I know everything about you.”

You turn and look at him.

“Huh? Say what?”

“Now, go and rescue that poor cat from the tree, big guy!” Alex whispers.

You turn and face the tree as you look up and see the cat on the branch, about 9 feet above you… But wait! Something strange is going on! You’re overcome by an odd tingling sensation all over your body! You let out a gasp as you feel everything shift around you. As you look around, you’re seeing something very strange happen. Everything, yes, absolutely everything and everyone around you appears to be shrinking rapidly!

“Uhhh….” You moan softly as you suddenly realize you’re GROWING! All of you! The people before you are shrinking, so are the buildings, the trees, the cars in the parking lot, the bushes… And the tall tree in front of you! Within moments, you’re suddenly staring at the tree branch, just above your head, which you can easily reach now with your big, long, muscular arms.

“Here, kitty, kitty!” you laugh as you reach over with your long arms and you easily grab the poor, stranded cat with your very large hands.

The poor kitten seems like a lost, miniature animal while sitting in the palms of your hands as you carefully bring it down while you squat to the ground and release it.

The crowd cheers before you as you stand up straight and then look down… You must look down because everybody, and I mean EVERYBODY else is smaller than you. Even the tallest person can barely reach your waist!

You look for Alex, who reaches to about halfway up your big, thick quads. He just smiles as he cranes his neck, looking up to you. You then realize how your clothes have grown to fit your larger body. You guess you must be at least twelve feet tall by now!

“How does it feel being a big, tall, 12-foot giant, Eric?” Alex asks you.

“Uhh… Well… It feels kinda… Amazing! I mean, I’m so… BIG! Holy crap! Everybody else just seems so small! I’m like twice as big as everybody else around here! This is very cool!” you say to him.

“Great! Well, let’s walk around the park, dude!” Alex said as he strolled along the path which circled the large lake.

While walking around the lake, you stop and admire your reflection in the water. Alex sees that and he comes and stands next to you. That is when it hits you how truly BIG you are.

“Pretty cool, huh?” Alex chuckles. “I can tell how much you’re enjoying being a giant!”

“Uhh… Okay, so you used your God-powers to make me grow, right?”

“Yup!”

“So… Are you gonna shrink me back to normal?”

Alex shook his head.

“Nope!”

Your jaw drops wide open.

“You’re not gonna shrink me? You’re gonna make me stay like this? This… BIG?” you ask him.

“Yup. This IS normal from now on.” Alex confirms. “This is your new reality.”

You blink. You stare at Alex. Then you remember. You’ve always been a big guy. People have always known you to be a huge, towering giant. Nothing unusual about it. You’re used to being bigger and taller than everybody else. This is no big deal.

“Lucky thing you were around to rescue the cat, Eric!” Alex smiled. “Sometimes it’s nice being twelve feet tall, huh?”

“Uhh, yeah… it has advantages… Sometimes!” you sigh as you hop on your super-giant skateboard while wearing your size 24 custom-made sneakers.

“Cool, let’s go to my house!” Alex says as you follow him to his place…

152.title: Open

info.brief_description: A child discovers that they have seemingly infinite power.
info.description:
You, in some way, know a child (or perhaps you are this child). However, this is no ordinary child. You soon find out that he or she somehow has the power of the divines, and is basically all-powerful, able to do anything he or she wants. How you live with (or live as) a child who can change the world at their very whim?

The child can be male or female (or neither or both if you want to go that way), can be any age, and can have a variety of personalities, from a goodie-two-shoes, to a mischievous prankster, to an all-out evil, demonic force (or perhaps a mixture of the three). The child can be either friendly, antagonistic, or indifferent to the main character. Basically, go all out and do whatever you want. I don't plan on putting a stop to anything unless I feel it's getting way too out of hand. At least some of my chapters will probably end up with a macro twist to them, but feel free to put in any other fetishes or interests you may have (of course, I'll like it a lot if some of those end up as macro or macro-related! ^_^). If you have any questions, please let me know. Thanks!
